   21: %%
   22: -module(mnesia_evil_coverage_test).
   23: -author('hakan@erix.ericsson.se').
   24: -include("mnesia_test_lib.hrl").
   25: 
   26: -export([init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2,
   27:          init_per_group/2, end_per_group/2,
   28:          all/0, groups/0]).
   29: 
   30: -export([system_info/1, table_info/1, error_description/1,
   31:          db_node_lifecycle/1, evil_delete_db_node/1, start_and_stop/1,
   32:          checkpoint/1, table_lifecycle/1, storage_options/1,
   33:          add_copy_conflict/1, add_copy_when_going_down/1, add_copy_when_dst_going_down/1,
   34:          add_copy_with_down/1,
   35:          replica_management/1, clear_table_during_load/1,
   36:          schema_availability/1, local_content/1,
   37:          replica_location/1, user_properties/1, unsupp_user_props/1,
   38:          sorted_ets/1, index_cleanup/1,
   39:          change_table_access_mode/1, change_table_load_order/1,
   40:          set_master_nodes/1, offline_set_master_nodes/1,
   41:          dump_tables/1, dump_log/1, wait_for_tables/1, force_load_table/1,
   42:          snmp_open_table/1, snmp_close_table/1, snmp_get_next_index/1,
   43:          snmp_get_row/1, snmp_get_mnesia_key/1, snmp_update_counter/1,
   44:          snmp_order/1, subscribe_standard/1, subscribe_extended/1,
   45:          foldl/1, info/1, schema_0/1, schema_1/1, view_0/1, view_1/1, view_2/1,
   46:          lkill/1, kill/1,
   47:          record_name_dirty_access_ram/1,
   48:          record_name_dirty_access_disc/1,
   49:          record_name_dirty_access_disc_only/1,
   50:          record_name_dirty_access_xets/1]).
   51: 
   52: -export([info_check/8, index_size/1]).
   53: 
   54: -define(cleanup(N, Config),
   55: 	mnesia_test_lib:prepare_test_case([{reload_appls, [mnesia]}],
   56: 					  N, Config, ?FILE, ?LINE)).
   57: init_per_testcase(Func, Conf) ->
   58:     mnesia_test_lib:init_per_testcase(Func, Conf).
   59: 
   60: end_per_testcase(Func, Conf) ->
   61:     mnesia_test_lib:end_per_testcase(Func, Conf).
   62: 
   63: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   64: all() -> 
   65:     [system_info, table_info, error_description,
   66:      db_node_lifecycle, evil_delete_db_node, start_and_stop,
   67:      checkpoint, table_lifecycle, storage_options, 
   68:      add_copy_conflict,
   69:      add_copy_when_going_down, add_copy_when_dst_going_down, add_copy_with_down,
   70:      replica_management,
   71:      clear_table_during_load,
   72:      schema_availability, local_content,
   73:      {group, table_access_modifications}, replica_location,
   74:      {group, table_sync}, user_properties, unsupp_user_props,
   75:      {group, record_name}, {group, snmp_access},
   76:      {group, subscriptions}, {group, iteration},
   77:      {group, debug_support}, sorted_ets, index_cleanup,
   78:      {mnesia_dirty_access_test, all},
   79:      {mnesia_trans_access_test, all},
   80:      {mnesia_evil_backup, all}].
   81: 
   82: groups() -> 
   83:     [{table_access_modifications, [],
   84:       [change_table_access_mode, change_table_load_order,
   85:        set_master_nodes, offline_set_master_nodes]},
   86:      {table_sync, [],
   87:       [dump_tables, dump_log, wait_for_tables,
   88:        force_load_table]},
   89:      {snmp_access, [],
   90:       [snmp_open_table, snmp_close_table, snmp_get_next_index,
   91:        snmp_get_row, snmp_get_mnesia_key, snmp_update_counter,
   92:        snmp_order]},
   93:      {subscriptions, [],
   94:       [subscribe_standard, subscribe_extended]},
   95:      {iteration, [], [foldl]},
   96:      {debug_support, [],
   97:       [info, schema_0, schema_1, view_0, view_1, view_2,
   98:        lkill, kill]},
   99:      {record_name, [], [{group, record_name_dirty_access}]},
  100:      {record_name_dirty_access, [],
  101:       [record_name_dirty_access_ram,
  102:        record_name_dirty_access_disc,
  103:        record_name_dirty_access_disc_only,
  104:        record_name_dirty_access_xets
  105:       ]}].
  106: 
  107: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  108:     Config.
  109: 
  110: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  111:     Config.
  112: 
  113: 
  114: 
  115: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  116: %% Get meta info about Mnesia
  117: 
  118: system_info(suite) -> [];
  119: system_info(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  120:     Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(all, Config),
  121:     Ns = ?sort(Nodes),
  122:     ?match(yes, mnesia:system_info(is_running)),
  123:     ?match(Ns, ?sort(mnesia:system_info(db_nodes))),
  124:     ?match(Ns, ?sort(mnesia:system_info(running_db_nodes))),
  125:     ?match(A when is_atom(A), mnesia:system_info(debug)),
  126:     ?match(L when is_list(L), mnesia:system_info(directory)),
  127:     ?match(L when is_list(L), mnesia:system_info(log_version)),
  128:     ?match({_, _}, mnesia:system_info(schema_version)),
  129:     ?match(L when is_list(L), mnesia:system_info(tables)),
  130:     ?match(L when is_list(L), mnesia:system_info(local_tables)),
  131:     ?match(L when is_list(L), mnesia:system_info(held_locks)),
  132:     ?match(L when is_list(L), mnesia:system_info(lock_queue)),
  133:     ?match(L when is_list(L), mnesia:system_info(transactions)),
  134:     ?match(I when is_integer(I), mnesia:system_info(transaction_failures)),
  135:     ?match(I when is_integer(I), mnesia:system_info(transaction_commits)),
  136:     ?match(I when is_integer(I), mnesia:system_info(transaction_restarts)),
  137:     ?match(L when is_list(L), mnesia:system_info(checkpoints)),
  138:     ?match(A when is_atom(A), mnesia:system_info(backup_module)),
  139:     ?match(true, mnesia:system_info(auto_repair)),
  140:     ?match({_, _}, mnesia:system_info(dump_log_interval)),
  141:     ?match(A when is_atom(A), mnesia:system_info(dump_log_update_in_place)),
  142:     ?match(I when is_integer(I), mnesia:system_info(transaction_log_writes)),
  143:     ?match(I when is_integer(I), mnesia:system_info(send_compressed)),
  144:     ?match(I when is_integer(I), mnesia:system_info(max_transfer_size)),
  145:     ?match(L when is_list(L), mnesia:system_info(all)),
  146:     ?match(L when is_list(L), mnesia:system_info(backend_types)),
  147:     ?match({'EXIT', {aborted, Reason }} when element(1, Reason) == badarg
  148:            , mnesia:system_info(ali_baba)),
  149:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
  150: 
  151: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  152: %% Get meta info about table
  153: 
  154: table_info(suite) -> [];
  155: table_info(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  156:     [Node1, Node2, Node3] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(3, Config),
  157:     
  158:     Tab  = table_info,
  159:     Type = bag,
  160:     ValPos = 3,
  161:     Attrs = [k, v],
  162:     Arity = length(Attrs) +1,
  163: 
  164:     Schema = 
  165: 	case mnesia_test_lib:diskless(Config) of
  166: 	    true -> [{type, Type}, {attributes, Attrs}, {index, [ValPos]},
  167: 		     {ram_copies, [Node1, Node2]}, {ext_ets, [Node3]}];
  168: 	    false ->		
  169: 		[{type, Type}, {attributes, Attrs}, {index, [ValPos]},
  170: 		 {disc_only_copies, [Node1]}, {ram_copies, [Node2]},
  171: 		 {ext_ets, [Node3]}]
  172: 	end,
  173:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab, Schema)),
  174: 
  175:     Size = 10,
  176:     Keys = lists:seq(1, Size),
  177:     Records = [{Tab, A, 7} || A <- Keys],
  178:     lists:foreach(fun(Rec) -> ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write(Rec)) end, Records),
  179: 
  180:     case mnesia_test_lib:diskless(Config) of
  181: 	true -> 
  182: 	    ?match(Nodes, mnesia:table_info(Tab, ram_copies));
  183: 	false ->              
  184: 	    ?match([Node3], mnesia:table_info(Tab, ext_ets)),
  185: 	    ?match([Node2], mnesia:table_info(Tab, ram_copies)),
  186: 	    ?match([Node1], mnesia:table_info(Tab, mnesia_test_lib:storage_type(disc_only_copies, Config)))
  187:     end,
  188:     Read = [Node1, Node2, Node3],
  189:     Write = ?sort([Node1, Node2, Node3]),
  190: 
  191:     {[ok,ok,ok], []} = rpc:multicall(Nodes, ?MODULE, info_check,
  192: 				     [Tab, Read, Write, Size, Type, ValPos, Arity, Attrs]),
  193: 
  194:     ?match({atomic, Attrs}, mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:table_info(Tab, attributes) end)),
  195: 
  196:     ?match(L when is_list(L), mnesia:table_info(Tab, all)),
  197: 
  198:     %% Table info when table not loaded
  199:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  200: 	   mnesia:create_table(tab_info, Schema)),
  201:     ?match(stopped, mnesia:stop()),
  202:     ?match(stopped, rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, stop, [])),
  203:     ?match(ok, mnesia:start()),
  204:     ?match(ok, mnesia:wait_for_tables([tab_info], 5000)),
  205:     ?match(0, mnesia:table_info(tab_info, size)),
  206:     ?verify_mnesia([Node1, Node3], [Node2]).
  207: 
  208: info_check(Tab, Read, Write, Size, Type, ValPos, Arity, Attrs) ->
  209:     ?match(true, lists:member(mnesia:table_info(Tab, where_to_read), Read)),
  210:     ?match(Write, ?sort(mnesia:table_info(Tab, where_to_write))),
  211:     ?match(Mem when is_integer(Mem), mnesia:table_info(Tab, memory)),
  212:     ?match(Size, mnesia:table_info(Tab, size)),
  213:     ?match(Type, mnesia:table_info(Tab, type)),
  214:     ?match([ValPos], mnesia:table_info(Tab, index)),
  215:     ?match(Arity, mnesia:table_info(Tab, arity)),
  216:     ?match(Attrs, mnesia:table_info(Tab, attributes)),
  217:     ?match({Tab, '_', '_'}, mnesia:table_info(Tab, wild_pattern)),
  218:     ok.
  219: 
  220: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  221: %% Check the error descriptions
  222: 
  223: error_description(suite) -> [];
  224: error_description(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  225:     ?acquire_nodes(1, Config),
  226:     Errors = [nested_transaction, badarg, no_transaction, combine_error,
  227:               bad_index, already_exists, index_exists, no_exists, system_limit,
  228:               mnesia_down, not_a_db_node, bad_type, node_not_running, 
  229:               truncated_binary_file, active, illegal
  230:              ],
  231:     ?match(X when is_atom(X), mnesia:error_description({error, bad_error_msg})),
  232:     ?match(X when is_tuple(X), mnesia:error_description({'EXIT', pid, bad})),
  233:     %% This is real error msg
  234:     ?match(X when is_tuple(X), mnesia:error_description(
  235:                               {error, 
  236:                                {"Cannot prepare checkpoint (bad reply)",
  237:                                 {{877,957351,758147},a@legolas},
  238:                                 {error,{node_not_running,a1@legolas}}}})),
  239:     check_errors(error, Errors),
  240:     check_errors(aborted, Errors),
  241:     check_errors('EXIT', Errors).
  242: 
  243: check_errors(_Err, []) -> ok;
  244: check_errors(Err, [Desc|R]) -> 
  245:     ?match(X when is_list(X), mnesia:error_description({Err, Desc})),
  246:     check_errors(Err, R).
  247: 
  248: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  249: %% Add and drop db nodes
  250: 
  251: db_node_lifecycle(suite) -> [];
  252: db_node_lifecycle(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  253:     [Node1, Node2, Node3] = AllNodes = ?acquire_nodes(3, Config),
  254:     Tab = db_node_lifecycle,
  255: 
  256:     Who = fun(T) ->
  257: 		  L1 = mnesia:table_info(T, ram_copies),
  258: 		  L2 = mnesia:table_info(T, disc_copies),
  259: 		  L3 = mnesia:table_info(T, disc_only_copies),
  260: 		  L4 = mnesia:table_info(T, ext_ets),
  261: 		  L1 ++ L2 ++ L3 ++ L4
  262: 	  end,
  263: 
  264:     SNs = ?sort(AllNodes),
  265: 
  266:     Schema = [{name, Tab}, {ram_copies, [Node1, Node2]}],
  267:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Schema)),
  268: 
  269:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:stop_mnesia(AllNodes)),
  270:     ?match(ok, mnesia:delete_schema(AllNodes)),
  271:     ?match({error, _}, mnesia:create_schema(foo)),
  272:     ?match({error, _}, mnesia:create_schema([foo])),
  273:     ?match({error, _}, mnesia:create_schema([foo@bar])),
  274:     ?match(ok, mnesia:start()),
  275:     ?match(false, mnesia:system_info(use_dir)),
  276:     ?match([ram_copies, disc_copies, disc_only_copies], mnesia:system_info(backend_types)),
  277:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab, [])),
  278:     ?match({aborted, {has_no_disc, Node1}}, mnesia:dump_tables([Tab])),
  279:     ?match({aborted, {has_no_disc, Node1}}, mnesia:change_table_copy_type(Tab, node(), disc_copies)),
  280:     ?match({aborted, {has_no_disc, Node1}}, mnesia:change_table_copy_type(Tab, node(), disc_only_copies)),
  281: 
  282:     ?match(stopped, mnesia:stop()),
  283: 
  284:     ?match(ok, mnesia:create_schema(AllNodes, ?BACKEND)),
  285:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia(AllNodes)),
  286: 
  287:     ?match([SNs, SNs, SNs], 
  288: 	   lists:map(fun lists:sort/1,
  289: 		     element(1, rpc:multicall(AllNodes, mnesia, table_info, 
  290: 					      [schema, disc_copies])))),
  291: 
  292:     ?match({aborted, {already_exists, schema, Node2, _}},
  293:            mnesia:change_table_copy_type(schema, Node2, disc_copies)),
  294:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  295:            mnesia:change_table_copy_type(schema, Node2, ram_copies)),
  296:     ?match({aborted, {already_exists, schema, Node2, _}},
  297:            mnesia:change_table_copy_type(schema, Node2, ram_copies)),
  298:     
  299:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  300:            mnesia:change_table_copy_type(schema, Node2, disc_copies)),
  301: 
  302:     ?match([SNs, SNs, SNs], 
  303: 	   lists:map(fun lists:sort/1,
  304: 		     element(1, rpc:multicall(AllNodes, mnesia, table_info, 
  305: 					      [schema, disc_copies])))),
  306: 
  307:     %% Delete the DB 
  308: 
  309:     Tab2 = disk_tab,
  310:     Tab3 = not_local,
  311:     Tab4 = local,
  312:     Tab5 = remote,
  313:     Tab6 = ext1,
  314: 
  315:     Tabs = [Schema,
  316: 	    [{name, Tab2},  {disc_copies, AllNodes}],
  317: 	    [{name, Tab3},  {ram_copies, [Node2, Node3]}],
  318: 	    [{name, Tab4},  {disc_only_copies, [Node1]}],
  319: 	    [{name, Tab5},  {disc_only_copies, [Node2]}],
  320: 	    [{name, Tab6},  {ext_ets, [Node1, Node2]}]
  321: 	   ],
  322: 
  323:     [?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(T)) || T <- Tabs ],
  324: 
  325:     ?match({aborted, {active, _, Node2}}, 
  326: 	   mnesia:del_table_copy(schema, Node2)),
  327: 
  328:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:stop_mnesia([Node1])),
  329:     ?match({aborted, {node_not_running, Node1}}, 
  330: 	   mnesia:del_table_copy(schema, Node2)),
  331: 
  332:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia([Node1],[Tab2,Tab4,Tab6])),
  333:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:stop_mnesia([Node2])),
  334:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:del_table_copy(schema, Node2)),
  335: 
  336:     %% Check
  337:     RemNodes = AllNodes -- [Node2],
  338: 
  339:     ?match(RemNodes, mnesia:system_info(db_nodes)),
  340:     ?match([Node1], Who(Tab)),
  341:     ?match(RemNodes, Who(Tab2)),
  342:     ?match([Node3], Who(Tab3)),
  343:     ?match([Node1], Who(Tab4)),
  344:     ?match({'EXIT', {aborted, {no_exists, _, _}}}, Who(Tab5)),
  345:     ?match([Node1], Who(Tab6)),
  346: 
  347:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:change_table_copy_type(Tab2, Node3, ram_copies)),
  348: 
  349:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:change_table_copy_type(schema, Node3, ram_copies)),
  350: 
  351:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:stop_mnesia([Node3])),
  352:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:del_table_copy(schema, Node3)),
  353:     ?match([Node1], mnesia:system_info(db_nodes)),
  354:     ?match([Node1], Who(Tab)),
  355:     ?match([Node1], Who(Tab2)),
  356:     ?match({'EXIT', {aborted, {no_exists, _, _}}}, Who(Tab3)),
  357:     ?match([Node1], Who(Tab4)),
  358:     ?match({'EXIT', {aborted, {no_exists, _, _}}}, Who(Tab5)),
  359: 
  360:     ?verify_mnesia([Node1], []).
  361: 
  362: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  363: %% Drop a db node when several disk resident nodes are down
  364: 
  365: evil_delete_db_node(suite) -> [];
  366: evil_delete_db_node(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  367:     [Node1, Node2, Node3] = AllNodes = ?acquire_nodes(3, Config),
  368:     Tab = evil_delete_db_node,
  369: 
  370:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab, [{disc_copies, AllNodes}])),
  371:     
  372:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:stop_mnesia([Node2, Node3])),
  373: 
  374:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:del_table_copy(schema, Node2)),
  375:     
  376:     RemNodes = AllNodes -- [Node2],
  377:     
  378:     ?match(RemNodes, mnesia:system_info(db_nodes)),
  379:     ?match(RemNodes, mnesia:table_info(Tab, disc_copies)),
  380:     
  381:     ?verify_mnesia([Node1], []).
  382: 
  383: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  384: %% Start and stop the system
  385: 
  386: start_and_stop(suite) -> [];
  387: start_and_stop(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  388:     [Node1 | _] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(all, Config),
  389: 
  390:     ?match(stopped, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, stop, [])),
  391:     ?match(stopped, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, stop, [])),
  392:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, start, [])),
  393:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, start, [])),
  394:     ?match(stopped, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, stop, [])),
  395:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes -- [Node1], [Node1]),
  396:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia(Nodes)),
  397:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
  398: 
  399: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  400: %% Checkpoints and backup management
  401: 
  402: checkpoint(suite) -> [];
  403: checkpoint(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  404:     checkpoint(2, Config),
  405:     checkpoint(3, Config),
  406:     ok.
  407: 
  408: checkpoint(NodeConfig, Config) ->
  409:     [Node1 | _] = TabNodes = ?acquire_nodes(NodeConfig, Config),
  410:     CreateTab = fun(Type, N, Ns) ->
  411:                         Tab0 = lists:concat(["local_checkpoint_", Type, N]),
  412:                         Tab = list_to_atom(Tab0),
  413:                         catch mnesia:delete_table(Tab),
  414:                         ?match({atomic, ok},
  415:                                mnesia:create_table(Tab, [{Type, Ns}])),
  416:                         Tab
  417:                 end,
  418:     CreateTabs = fun(Type, Acc) ->
  419:                          [CreateTab(Type, 1, [hd(TabNodes)]),
  420:                           CreateTab(Type, 2, TabNodes),
  421:                           CreateTab(Type, 3, [lists:last(TabNodes)])] ++
  422:                              Acc
  423:                  end,
  424:     Types = [ram_copies, disc_copies, disc_only_copies, ext_ets],
  425:     Tabs = lists:foldl(CreateTabs, [], Types),
  426:     Recs = ?sort([{T, N, N} || T <- Tabs, N <- lists:seq(1, 10)]),
  427:     lists:foreach(fun(R) -> ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write(R)) end, Recs),
  428: 
  429:     CpName = a_checkpoint_name,
  430:     MinArgs = [{name, CpName}, {min, Tabs}, {allow_remote, false}],
  431:     ?match({error, _}, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, activate_checkpoint, [MinArgs])),
  432: 
  433:     MaxArgs = [{name, CpName}, {max, Tabs}, {allow_remote, true}],
  434:     ?match({ok, CpName, L} when is_list(L),
  435: 	   rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, activate_checkpoint, [MaxArgs])),
  436:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, deactivate_checkpoint, [CpName])),
  437: 
  438:     Args = [{name, CpName}, {min, Tabs}, {allow_remote, true}],
  439:     ?match({ok, CpName, L} when is_list(L),
  440:            rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, activate_checkpoint, [Args])),
  441:     Recs2 = ?sort([{T, K, 0} || {T, K, _} <- Recs]),
  442:     lists:foreach(fun(R) -> ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write(R)) end, Recs2),
  443:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, deactivate_checkpoint, [CpName])),
  444: 
  445:     ?match({error, Reason1 } when element(1, Reason1) == no_exists,
  446:            mnesia:deactivate_checkpoint(CpName)),
  447:     ?match({error, Reason2 } when element(1, Reason2) == badarg,
  448:            mnesia:activate_checkpoint(foo)),
  449:     ?match({error, Reason3 } when element(1, Reason3) == badarg,
  450:            mnesia:activate_checkpoint([{foo, foo}])),
  451:     ?match({error, Reason4 } when element(1, Reason4) == badarg,
  452:            mnesia:activate_checkpoint([{max, foo}])),
  453:     ?match({error, Reason5 } when element(1, Reason5) == badarg,
  454:            mnesia:activate_checkpoint([{min, foo}])),
  455:     ?match({error, _}, mnesia:activate_checkpoint([{min, [foo@bar]}])),
  456:     ?match({error, Reason6 } when element(1, Reason6) == badarg,
  457:            mnesia:activate_checkpoint([{allow_remote, foo}])),
  458: 
  459:     Fun = fun(Tab) -> ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:delete_table(Tab)) end,
  460:     lists:foreach(Fun, Tabs),
  461:     ?verify_mnesia(TabNodes, []).
  462: 
  463: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  464: %% Create and delete tables
  465: 
  466: %% Get meta info about table
  467: 
  468: -define(vrl, mnesia_test_lib:verify_replica_location).
  469: 
  470: replica_location(suite) -> [];
  471: replica_location(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  472:     [Node1, Node2, Node3] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(3, Config),
  473: 
  474:     %% Create three replicas
  475:     Check = fun(Tab, Schema) ->
  476: 		    ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table([{name, Tab}|Schema])),
  477: 		    ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [Node1], [Node2], [Node3], Nodes)),
  478: 
  479: 		    %% Delete one replica
  480: 		    ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:del_table_copy(Tab, Node2)),
  481: 		    ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [Node1], [], [Node3], Nodes)),
  482: 
  483: 		    %% Move one replica
  484: 		    ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:move_table_copy(Tab, Node1, Node2)),
  485: 		    ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [Node2], [], [Node3], Nodes)),
  486: 
  487: 		    %% Change replica type
  488: 		    ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:change_table_copy_type(Tab, Node2, ram_copies)),
  489: 		    ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [], [Node2], [Node3], Nodes))
  490: 	    end,
  491:     Check(replica_location, [{disc_only_copies, [Node1]},
  492: 			     {ram_copies, [Node2]}, {disc_copies, [Node3]}]),
  493: 
  494:     Check(ext_location, [{disc_only_copies, [Node1]},
  495: 			 {ext_ets, [Node2]}, {disc_copies, [Node3]}]),
  496: 
  497:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
  498: 
  499: table_lifecycle(suite) -> [];
  500: table_lifecycle(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  501:     [Node1, Node2] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
  502: 
  503:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table([{type, bag},
  504: 					      {ram_copies, [Node1]},
  505: 					      {attributes, [rajtan, tajtan]},
  506: 					      {name, order_of_args}])),
  507:     ?match([], mnesia:dirty_read({order_of_args, 4711})),
  508:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table([{name, already_exists},
  509: 					      {ram_copies, [Node1]}])),
  510:     ?match({aborted, Reason23 } when element(1, Reason23) ==already_exists,
  511: 	   mnesia:create_table([{name, already_exists},
  512: 				{ram_copies, [Node1]}])),
  513:     ?match({aborted, Reason21 } when element(1, Reason21) == bad_type,
  514:            mnesia:create_table([{name, bad_node}, {ram_copies, ["foo"]}])),
  515:     ?match({aborted, Reason2} when element(1, Reason2) == bad_type,
  516:            mnesia:create_table([{name, zero_arity}, {attributes, []}])),
  517:     ?match({aborted, Reason3} when element(1, Reason3) == badarg,
  518:            mnesia:create_table([])),
  519:     ?match({aborted, Reason4} when element(1, Reason4) == badarg,
  520:            mnesia:create_table(atom)),
  521:     ?match({aborted, Reason5} when element(1, Reason5) == badarg,
  522:            mnesia:create_table({cstruct, table_name_as_atom})),
  523:     ?match({aborted, Reason6 } when element(1, Reason6) == bad_type,
  524:            mnesia:create_table([{name, no_host}, {ram_copies, foo}])),
  525:     ?match({aborted, Reason7 } when element(1, Reason7) == bad_type,
  526:            mnesia:create_table([{name, no_host}, {disc_only_copies, foo}])),
  527:     ?match({aborted, Reason8} when element(1, Reason8) == bad_type,
  528:            mnesia:create_table([{name, no_host}, {disc_copies, foo}])),
  529: 
  530:     CreateFun =
  531:         fun() -> ?match({aborted, nested_transaction},
  532:                         mnesia:create_table([{name, nested_trans}])), ok
  533:         end,
  534:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:transaction(CreateFun)),
  535:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table([{name, remote_tab},
  536: 					      {ram_copies, [Node2]}])),
  537: 
  538:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table([{name, a_brand_new_tab},
  539: 					      {ram_copies, [Node1]}])),
  540:     ?match([], mnesia:dirty_read({a_brand_new_tab, 4711})),
  541:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:delete_table(a_brand_new_tab)),
  542:     ?match({'EXIT', {aborted, Reason31}} when element(1, Reason31) == no_exists,
  543:            mnesia:dirty_read({a_brand_new_tab, 4711})),
  544:     ?match({aborted, Reason41} when element(1, Reason41) == no_exists,
  545:            mnesia:delete_table(a_brand_new_tab)),
  546:     ?match({aborted, Reason9} when element(1, Reason9) == badarg,
  547:            mnesia:create_table([])),
  548: 
  549:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table([{name, nested_del_trans},
  550: 					      {ram_copies, [Node1]}])),
  551: 
  552:     DeleteFun = fun() -> ?match({aborted, nested_transaction},
  553:                                 mnesia:delete_table(nested_del_trans)), ok end,
  554:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:transaction(DeleteFun)),
  555: 
  556:     ?match({aborted, Reason10} when element(1, Reason10) == bad_type,
  557:            mnesia:create_table([{name, create_with_index}, {index, 2}])),
  558:     ?match({aborted, Reason32} when element(1, Reason32) == bad_type,
  559:            mnesia:create_table([{name, create_with_index}, {index, [-1]}])),
  560:     ?match({aborted, Reason33} when element(1, Reason33) == bad_type,
  561:            mnesia:create_table([{name, create_with_index}, {index, [0]}])),
  562:     ?match({aborted, Reason34} when element(1, Reason34) == bad_type,
  563:            mnesia:create_table([{name, create_with_index}, {index, [1]}])),
  564:     ?match({aborted, Reason35} when element(1, Reason35) == bad_type,
  565:            mnesia:create_table([{name, create_with_index}, {index, [2]}])),
  566:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  567:            mnesia:create_table([{name, create_with_index}, {index, [3]},
  568:                                 {ram_copies, [Node1]}])),
  569: 
  570:     ets:new(ets_table, [named_table]),
  571:     ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:create_table(ets_table, [{ram_copies, Nodes}])),
  572:     ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:create_table(ets_table, [{ram_copies, [Node1]}])),
  573:     ets:delete(ets_table),
  574:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(ets_table, [{ram_copies, [Node1]}])),
  575:     ?match(Node1, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia_lib, val, [{ets_table,where_to_read}])),
  576:     ?match(Node1, rpc:call(Node2, mnesia_lib, val, [{ets_table,where_to_read}])),
  577:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:change_table_copy_type(ets_table, Node1, disc_only_copies)),    
  578:     ?match(Node1, rpc:call(Node2, mnesia_lib, val, [{ets_table,where_to_read}])),
  579:     
  580:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
  581: 
  582: 
  583: storage_options(suite) -> [];
  584: storage_options(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  585:     [N1,N2,N3] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(3, Config),
  586: 
  587:     ?match({aborted,_}, mnesia:create_table(a, [{storage_properties, [{ets,foobar}]}])),
  588:     ?match({aborted,_}, mnesia:create_table(a, [{storage_properties, [{ets,[foobar]}]}])),
  589:     ?match({aborted,_}, mnesia:create_table(a, [{storage_properties, [{ets,[duplicate_bag]}]}])),
  590:     ?match({aborted,_}, mnesia:create_table(a, [{storage_properties, [{dets,[{type,bag}]}]}])),
  591: 
  592:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(a, [{ram_copies, [N1]},
  593: 						 {disc_only_copies, [N2]},
  594: 						 {storage_properties,
  595: 						  [{ets,[compressed]},
  596: 						   {dets, [{auto_save, 5000}]} ]}])),
  597:     ?match(true, ets:info(a, compressed)),
  598:     ?match(5000, rpc:call(N2, dets, info, [a, auto_save])),
  599:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({a,1,1})),
  600:     ?match([{a,1,1}], mnesia:dirty_read({a,1})),
  601:     mnesia:dump_log(),
  602:     W2C1 = [{N2, disc_only_copies}, {N1, ram_copies}],
  603:     ?match(W2C1, lists:sort(rpc:call(N2, mnesia_lib, val, [{a, where_to_commit}]))),
  604:     ?match(W2C1, lists:sort(rpc:call(N3, mnesia_lib, val, [{a, where_to_commit}]))),
  605:     ?match({atomic,ok}, mnesia:change_table_copy_type(a, N1, disc_only_copies)),
  606:     W2C2 = [{N2, disc_only_copies}, {N1, disc_only_copies}],
  607:     ?match(W2C2, lists:sort(rpc:call(N2, mnesia_lib, val, [{a, where_to_commit}]))),
  608:     ?match(W2C2, lists:sort(rpc:call(N3, mnesia_lib, val, [{a, where_to_commit}]))),
  609:     ?match(undefined, ets:info(a, compressed)),
  610:     ?match(5000, dets:info(a, auto_save)),
  611:     ?match({atomic,ok}, mnesia:change_table_copy_type(a, N1, disc_copies)),
  612:     ?match(true, ets:info(a, compressed)),
  613: 
  614:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
  615: 
  616: 
  617: clear_table_during_load(suite) -> [];
  618: clear_table_during_load(doc) ->
  619:     ["Clear table caused during load caused a schema entry in the actual tab"];
  620: clear_table_during_load(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  621:     Nodes = [_, Node2] = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config ++ [{tc_timeout, timer:minutes(2)}]),
  622:     ?match({atomic,ok}, mnesia:create_table(cleartab, [{ram_copies, Nodes}])),
  623:     Tester = self(),
  624:     Bin = <<"Testingasdasd", 0:32000>>,
  625:     Fill =  fun() -> [mnesia:write({cleartab, N, Bin}) || N <- lists:seq(1, 3000)], ok end,
  626:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:sync_transaction(Fill)),
  627: 
  628:     StopAndStart = fun() ->
  629: 			   stopped = mnesia:stop(),
  630: 			   Tester ! {self(), stopped},
  631: 			   receive start_node -> ok end,
  632: 			   ok = mnesia:start(),
  633: 			   ok = mnesia:wait_for_tables([cleartab], 2000),
  634: 			   lists:foreach(fun({cleartab,_,_}) -> ok;
  635: 					    (What) -> Tester ! {failed, What},
  636: 						      unlink(Tester),
  637: 						      exit(foo)
  638: 					 end,
  639: 					 ets:tab2list(cleartab)),
  640: 			   Tester ! {self(), ok},
  641: 			   normal
  642: 		   end,
  643: 
  644:     Test = fun(N) ->
  645: 		   Pid = spawn_link(Node2, StopAndStart),
  646: 		   receive {Pid, stopped} -> ok end,
  647: 		   Pid ! start_node,
  648: 		   timer:sleep(N*10),
  649: 		   {atomic, ok} = mnesia:clear_table(cleartab),
  650: 		   receive
  651: 		       {Pid, ok} -> ok;
  652: 		       {failed, What} ->
  653: 			   io:format("Failed in ~p tries, with ~p~n",[N, What]),
  654: 			   exit({error, What});
  655: 		       {'EXIT', Pid, Reason} ->
  656: 			   exit({died, Reason})
  657: 		   end
  658: 	   end,
  659:     [Test(N) || N <- lists:seq(1, 10)],
  660:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
  661: 
  662: 
  663: add_copy_conflict(suite) -> [];
  664: add_copy_conflict(doc) -> 
  665:     ["Verify that OTP-5065 doesn't happen again, whitebox testing"];
  666: add_copy_conflict(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  667:     Nodes = [Node1, Node2] = 
  668: 	?acquire_nodes(2, Config ++ [{tc_timeout, timer:minutes(2)}]),
  669:     
  670:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(a, [{ram_copies, Nodes}])),
  671:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(b, [{ram_copies, Nodes}])),
  672:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(test, [{ram_copies, [Node2]}])),            
  673:     mnesia:stop(),
  674:     ?match(ok,mnesia:start([{no_table_loaders, 1}])),
  675: 
  676:     verify_ll_queue(10),
  677: 
  678:     Self = self(),
  679:     Test = fun() ->
  680: 		   Res = mnesia:add_table_copy(test, Node1, ram_copies),
  681: 		   Self ! {test, Res}
  682: 	   end,
  683:     %% Create conflict with loader queue.
  684:     spawn_link(Test),
  685:     ?match_receive(timeout),
  686:     %% Conflict ok
  687:     mnesia_controller:unblock_controller(),
  688:     
  689:     ?match_receive({test, {atomic,ok}}),
  690:     ?match(ok, mnesia:wait_for_tables([a,b], 3000)),
  691:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []),
  692:     ?cleanup(1, Config).
  693: 
  694: verify_ll_queue(0) ->
  695:     ?error("Couldn't find anything in queue~n",[]);
  696: verify_ll_queue(N) ->
  697:     ?match(granted,mnesia_controller:block_controller()),
  698:     case mnesia_controller:get_info(1000) of
  699: 	{info,{state,_,true,[],_Loader,[],[],[],_,_,_,_,_,_}} ->
  700: 	    %% Very slow SMP machines haven't loaded it yet..
  701: 	    mnesia_controller:unblock_controller(),
  702: 	    timer:sleep(10),
  703: 	    verify_ll_queue(N-1);
  704: 	{info,{state,_,true,[],Loader,LL,[],[],_,_,_,_,_,_}} ->
  705: 	    io:format("~p~n", [{Loader,LL}]),
  706: 	    ?match([_], LL);  %% Verify that something is in the loader queue
  707: 	Else ->
  708: 	    ?error("No match ~p maybe the internal format has changed~n",[Else])
  709:     end.
  710: 
  711: add_copy_when_going_down(suite) -> [];
  712: add_copy_when_going_down(doc) -> 
  713:     ["Tests abort when node we load from goes down"];
  714: add_copy_when_going_down(Config) -> 
  715:     [Node1, Node2] = 
  716: 	?acquire_nodes(2, Config ++ [{tc_timeout, timer:minutes(2)}]),
  717:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(a, [{ram_copies, [Node1]}])),
  718:     %% Grab a write lock 
  719:     Tester = self(),
  720:     WriteAndWait = fun() -> 
  721: 			   mnesia:write({a,1,1}),
  722: 			   Tester ! {self(), got_lock},
  723: 			   receive continue -> ok
  724: 			   end
  725: 		   end,
  726:     Locker = spawn(fun() -> mnesia:transaction(WriteAndWait) end),
  727:     receive {Locker, got_lock} -> ok end,
  728: 
  729:     spawn_link(fun() -> Res = rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, add_table_copy,
  730: 				       [a, Node2, ram_copies]),
  731: 			Tester ! {test, Res}
  732: 	       end),
  733:     %% We have a lock here we should get a timeout
  734:     ?match_receive(timeout),
  735:     mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([Node1]),
  736:     ?match_receive({test,{aborted,_}}),
  737:     ?verify_mnesia([Node2], []).
  738: 
  739: add_copy_when_dst_going_down(suite) -> [];
  740: add_copy_when_dst_going_down(doc) ->
  741:     ["Table copy destination node goes down. Verify that the issue fixed in erlang/otp#6013 doesn't happen again, whitebox testing."];
  742: add_copy_when_dst_going_down(Config) ->
  743:     [Node1, Node2] = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
  744:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(a, [{ram_copies, [Node1]}])),
  745:     lists:foreach(fun(I) ->
  746:                           ok = mnesia:sync_dirty(fun() -> mnesia:write({a, I, I}) end)
  747:                   end,
  748:                   lists:seq(1, 100000)),
  749:     ?match({ok, _}, mnesia:change_config(extra_db_nodes, [Node2])),
  750: 
  751:     %% Start table copy
  752:     Tester = self(),
  753:     spawn_link(fun() ->
  754:                        mnesia:add_table_copy(a, Node2, ram_copies),
  755:                        Tester ! add_table_copy_finished
  756:                end),
  757:     timer:sleep(10),  % Wait for `mnesia_loader:send_more/6` has started
  758: 
  759:     %% Grab a write lock
  760:     spawn_link(fun() ->
  761:                        Fun = fun() ->
  762:                                      ok = mnesia:write_lock_table(a),
  763:                                      Tester ! {write_lock_acquired, self()},
  764:                                      receive node2_mnesia_killed -> ok
  765:                                      end,
  766:                                      Tester ! write_lock_released,
  767:                                      ok
  768:                              end,
  769:                        mnesia:transaction(Fun)
  770:                end),
  771:     receive {write_lock_acquired, Locker} -> ok
  772:     end,
  773:     timer:sleep(200),  % Wait for `mnesia_loader:send_more/6` has finished
  774:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([Node2])),
  775:     Locker ! node2_mnesia_killed,
  776: 
  777:     receive write_lock_released -> ok
  778:     end,
  779:     receive add_table_copy_finished -> ok
  780:     end,
  781:     timer:sleep(1000),  % Wait for `mnesia_loader:finish_copy/5` has acquired the read lock
  782: 
  783:     %% Grab a write lock
  784:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write_lock_table(a) end, 10)),
  785:     ?verify_mnesia([Node1], []).
  786: 
  787: add_copy_with_down(suite) -> [];
  788: add_copy_with_down(Config) ->
  789:     %% Allow add_table_copy() with ram_copies even all other replicas are down
  790:     Nodes = [Node1, Node2, Node3] = ?acquire_nodes(3, Config),
  791:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(a, [{ram_copies, [Node3]}, {disc_copies, [Node2]}])),
  792:     stopped = rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, stop, []),
  793:     stopped = rpc:call(Node3, mnesia, stop, []),
  794:     ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:add_table_copy(a, Node1, ram_copies)),
  795:     ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:del_table_copy(a, Node2)),
  796:     ok = rpc:call(Node3, mnesia, start, []),
  797:     ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:add_table_copy(a, Node1, ram_copies)),
  798:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia([Node2], [a])),
  799:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:change_table_copy_type(a, Node2, ram_copies)),
  800:     stopped = rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, stop, []),
  801:     stopped = rpc:call(Node3, mnesia, stop, []),
  802:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:add_table_copy(a, Node1, ram_copies)),
  803:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({a,1,1})),
  804:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia([Node2,Node3], [a])),
  805:     ?match([{a,1,1}], rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, dirty_read, [{a,1}])),
  806:     ?match([{a,1,1}], rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, dirty_read, [{a,1}])),
  807:     ?match([{a,1,1}], rpc:call(Node3, mnesia, dirty_read, [{a,1}])),
  808: 
  809:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:del_table_copy(a, Node1)),
  810:     stopped = rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, stop, []),
  811:     stopped = rpc:call(Node3, mnesia, stop, []),
  812:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:add_table_copy(a, Node1, disc_copies)),
  813:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({a,1,1})),
  814:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia([Node2,Node3], [a])),
  815:     ?match([{a,1,1}], rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, dirty_read, [{a,1}])),
  816:     ?match([{a,1,1}], rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, dirty_read, [{a,1}])),
  817:     ?match([{a,1,1}], rpc:call(Node3, mnesia, dirty_read, [{a,1}])),
  818: 
  819:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:del_table_copy(a, Node1)),
  820:     stopped = rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, stop, []),
  821:     stopped = rpc:call(Node3, mnesia, stop, []),
  822:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:add_table_copy(a, Node1, disc_only_copies)),
  823:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({a,1,1})),
  824:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia([Node2,Node3], [a])),
  825:     ?match([{a,1,1}], rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, dirty_read, [{a,1}])),
  826:     ?match([{a,1,1}], rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, dirty_read, [{a,1}])),
  827:     ?match([{a,1,1}], rpc:call(Node3, mnesia, dirty_read, [{a,1}])),
  828: 
  829:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
  830: 
  831: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  832: %% Add, drop and move replicas, change storage types
  833: %% Change table layout (only arity change supported)
  834: 
  835: -record(replica_management, {k, v}).
  836: -record(new_replica_management, {k, v, extra}).
  837: 
  838: -define(SS(R), lists:sort(element(1,R))).
  839: 
  840: replica_management(doc) ->
  841:     "Add, drop and move replicas, change storage types.";
  842: replica_management(suite) ->
  843:     [];
  844: replica_management(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  845:     %% add_table_copy/3, del_table_copy/2, move_table_copy/3,
  846:     %% change_table_copy_type/3, transform_table/3
  847: 
  848:     Nodes = [Node1, Node2, Node3] = ?acquire_nodes(3, Config),
  849: 
  850:     Tab = replica_management,
  851:     Attrs = record_info(fields, replica_management),
  852: 
  853:     %%
  854:     %% Add, delete and change replicas
  855:     %%
  856:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  857:            mnesia:create_table([{name, Tab}, {attributes, Attrs},
  858:                                 {ram_copies, [Node1]}, {ext_ets, [Node3]}])),
  859:     [?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, K, K + 2})) || K <-lists:seq(1, 10)],
  860:     ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [], [Node1, Node3], [], Nodes)),
  861:     %% R - -
  862:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:dump_tables([Tab])),
  863:     ?match({aborted,  Reason50 } when element(1, Reason50) == combine_error,
  864: 	   mnesia:add_table_copy(Tab, Node2, disc_copies)),
  865:     ?match({aborted,  Reason51 } when element(1, Reason51) == combine_error,
  866:            mnesia:change_table_copy_type(Tab, Node1, disc_copies)),
  867:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:clear_table(Tab)),
  868:     SyncedCheck = fun() ->
  869: 			  mnesia:lock({record,Tab,0}, write),
  870: 			  ?match([0,0,0], ?SS(rpc:multicall(Nodes, mnesia, table_info, [Tab, size])))
  871: 		  end,
  872:     mnesia:transaction(SyncedCheck),
  873: 
  874:     ?match({[0,0,0], []}, rpc:multicall(Nodes, mnesia, table_info, [Tab, size])),
  875:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:del_table_copy(Tab, Node1)),
  876:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:del_table_copy(Tab, Node3)),
  877:     ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [], [], [], Nodes)),
  878:     %% - - -
  879:     ?match({aborted,Reason52} when element(1, Reason52) ==  no_exists,
  880:            mnesia:add_table_copy(Tab, Node3, ram_copies)),
  881: 
  882:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table([{name, Tab},
  883: 					      {attributes, Attrs},
  884: 					      {disc_copies, [Node1]}])),
  885:     ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [], [], [Node1], Nodes)),
  886:     %% D - -
  887:     [?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, K, K + 2})) || K <-lists:seq(1, 10)],
  888: 
  889:     ?match({aborted,  Reason53} when element(1, Reason53) == badarg,
  890:            mnesia:add_table_copy(Tab, Node2, bad_storage_type)),
  891:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:add_table_copy(Tab, Node2, disc_only_copies)),
  892:     ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [Node2], [], [Node1], Nodes)),
  893:     ?match([0,10,10], ?SS(rpc:multicall(Nodes, mnesia, table_info, [Tab, size]))),
  894:     %% D DO -
  895:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:add_table_copy(Tab, Node3, ext_ets)),
  896:     ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [Node2], [Node3], [Node1], Nodes)),
  897:     ?match([10,10,10], ?SS(rpc:multicall(Nodes, mnesia, table_info, [Tab, size]))),
  898:     %% D DO R
  899:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  900:            mnesia:change_table_copy_type(Tab, Node1, disc_only_copies)),
  901:     ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [Node1, Node2], [Node3], [], Nodes)),
  902:     ?match([10,10,10], ?SS(rpc:multicall(Nodes, mnesia, table_info, [Tab, size]))),
  903:     %% DO DO R
  904:     ?match({aborted,  Reason54} when element(1, Reason54) == already_exists,
  905:            mnesia:add_table_copy(Tab, Node3, ram_copies)),
  906:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:del_table_copy(Tab, Node1)),
  907:     ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [Node2], [Node3], [], Nodes)),
  908:     %% - DO R
  909:     ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:del_table_copy(Tab, Node1)),
  910:     ?match(Tab, ets:new(Tab, [named_table])),
  911:     ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:add_table_copy(Tab, Node1, disc_copies)),
  912:     ?match(true, ets:delete(Tab)),
  913:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:add_table_copy(Tab, Node1, disc_copies)),
  914:     ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [Node2], [Node3], [Node1], Nodes)),
  915:     ?match([10,10,10], ?SS(rpc:multicall(Nodes, mnesia, table_info, [Tab, size]))),
  916:     %% D DO R
  917:     ?match({atomic, ok},mnesia:change_table_copy_type(Tab, Node3, disc_only_copies)),
  918:     ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [Node2, Node3], [], [Node1], Nodes)),
  919:     ?match([10,10,10], ?SS(rpc:multicall(Nodes, mnesia, table_info, [Tab, size]))),
  920: 
  921:     %% D DO D0
  922:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:change_table_copy_type(Tab, Node3, ext_ets)),
  923:     ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [Node2], [Node3], [Node1], Nodes)),
  924:     ?match([10,10,10], ?SS(rpc:multicall(Nodes, mnesia, table_info, [Tab, size]))),
  925:     %% D DO R
  926:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  927:            mnesia:change_table_copy_type(Tab, Node2, disc_copies)),
  928:     ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [], [Node3], [Node1,Node2], Nodes)),
  929:     ?match([10,10,10], ?SS(rpc:multicall(Nodes, mnesia, table_info, [Tab, size]))),
  930: 
  931:     %% D D R
  932:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:change_table_copy_type(Tab, Node1, disc_only_copies)),
  933:     ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [Node1], [Node3], [Node2], Nodes)),
  934:     ?match([10,10,10], ?SS(rpc:multicall(Nodes, mnesia, table_info, [Tab, size]))),
  935: 
  936:     %% DO D R
  937:     ?match(Tab, ets:new(Tab, [named_table])),
  938:     ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:change_table_copy_type(Tab, Node1, ram_copies)),
  939:     ?match(true, ets:delete(Tab)),
  940:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:change_table_copy_type(Tab, Node1, ram_copies)),
  941:     ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [], [Node3,Node1], [Node2], Nodes)),
  942:     ?match([10,10,10], ?SS(rpc:multicall(Nodes, mnesia, table_info, [Tab, size]))),
  943:     %% R D R
  944:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:change_table_copy_type(Tab, Node1, disc_copies)),
  945:     ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [], [Node3], [Node2,Node1], Nodes)),
  946:     ?match([10,10,10], ?SS(rpc:multicall(Nodes, mnesia, table_info, [Tab, size]))),
  947: 
  948:     %% D D R
  949:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:change_table_copy_type(Tab, Node2, disc_only_copies)),
  950:     ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [Node2], [Node3], [Node1], Nodes)),
  951:     ?match([10,10,10], ?SS(rpc:multicall(Nodes, mnesia, table_info, [Tab, size]))),
  952: 
  953:     %% D DO R
  954:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:change_table_copy_type(Tab, Node3, disc_only_copies)),
  955:     ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [Node2, Node3], [], [Node1], Nodes)),
  956:     ?match([10,10,10], ?SS(rpc:multicall(Nodes, mnesia, table_info, [Tab, size]))),
  957:     %% D DO DO
  958:     %% test clear
  959:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:clear_table(Tab)),
  960:     mnesia:transaction(SyncedCheck),
  961: 
  962:     %% rewrite for rest of testcase
  963:     [?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, K, K + 2})) || K <-lists:seq(1, 10)],
  964: 
  965:     %% D DO DO
  966:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:del_table_copy(Tab, Node2)),
  967:     ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [Node3], [], [Node1], Nodes)),
  968:     %% D - DO
  969:     ?match({aborted,  Reason55} when element(1, Reason55) == already_exists,
  970:            mnesia:change_table_copy_type(Tab, Node1, disc_copies)),
  971: 
  972:     %%
  973:     %% Move replica
  974:     %%
  975:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:move_table_copy(Tab, Node1, Node2)),
  976:     ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [Node3], [], [Node2], Nodes)),
  977:     ?match([0,10,10], ?SS(rpc:multicall(Nodes, mnesia, table_info, [Tab, size]))),
  978:     %% - D DO
  979:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:change_table_copy_type(Tab, Node3, ext_ets)),
  980:     ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [], [Node3], [Node2], Nodes)),
  981:     ?match([0,10,10], ?SS(rpc:multicall(Nodes, mnesia, table_info, [Tab, size]))),
  982:     %% - D ER
  983:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:move_table_copy(Tab, Node3, Node1)),
  984:     ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [], [Node1], [Node2], Nodes)),
  985:     ?match([0,10,10], ?SS(rpc:multicall(Nodes, mnesia, table_info, [Tab, size]))),
  986:     %% ER D -
  987: 
  988:     ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:move_table_copy(Tab, Node1, Node2)),
  989:     ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:move_table_copy(Tab, Node3, Node2)),
  990:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:move_table_copy(Tab, Node1, Node3)),
  991:     %% - D ER
  992:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:stop_mnesia([Node3])),
  993:     ?match({atomic,ok}, mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write({Tab, 43, sync_me}) end)),
  994:     ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [], [Node3], [Node2],Nodes -- [Node3])),
  995:     %% - D ER
  996:     ?match({aborted,Reason56} when element(1, Reason56) == not_active,
  997: 	   mnesia:move_table_copy(Tab, Node3, Node1)),
  998:     ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [], [Node3], [Node2],Nodes -- [Node3])),
  999:     %% - D ER
 1000:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia([Node3])),
 1001:     ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [], [Node3], [Node2], Nodes)),
 1002:     %% - D ER
 1003:     ?match([{Tab,43,sync_me}], mnesia:dirty_read({Tab,43})),
 1004:     
 1005:     %%
 1006:     %% Transformer
 1007:     %%
 1008: 
 1009:     NewAttrs = record_info(fields, new_replica_management),
 1010:     Transformer =
 1011:         fun(Rec) when is_record(Rec, replica_management) -> 
 1012: 		#new_replica_management{k = Rec#replica_management.k,
 1013: 					v = Rec#replica_management.v,
 1014: 					extra = Rec#replica_management.k * 2}
 1015:         end,
 1016:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:transform_table(Tab, fun(R) -> R end, Attrs)),
 1017:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:transform_table(Tab, Transformer, NewAttrs, new_replica_management)),
 1018: 
 1019:     ERlist = [#new_replica_management{k = K, v = K+2, extra = K*2} || K <- lists:seq(1, 10)],
 1020:     ARlist = [hd(mnesia:dirty_read(Tab, K)) || K <- lists:seq(1, 10)],
 1021: 
 1022:     ?match(ERlist, ARlist),
 1023: 
 1024:     ?match({aborted,  Reason56} when element(1, Reason56) == bad_type,
 1025:            mnesia:transform_table(Tab, Transformer, 0)),
 1026:     ?match({aborted, Reason57} when element(1, Reason57) ==  bad_type,
 1027:            mnesia:transform_table(Tab, Transformer, -1)),
 1028:     ?match({aborted, Reason58} when element(1, Reason58) ==  bad_type,
 1029:            mnesia:transform_table(Tab, Transformer, [])),
 1030:     ?match({aborted,  Reason59} when element(1, Reason59) == bad_type,
 1031:            mnesia:transform_table(Tab, no_fun, NewAttrs)),
 1032:     ?match({aborted,  Reason59} when element(1, Reason59) == bad_type,
 1033:            mnesia:transform_table(Tab, fun(X) -> X end, NewAttrs, {tuple})),
 1034: 
 1035:     %% OTP-3878 
 1036:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:transform_table(Tab, ignore, 
 1037:                                                 NewAttrs ++ [dummy])),
 1038:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:transform_table(Tab, ignore, 
 1039:                                                 NewAttrs ++ [dummy], last_rec)),
 1040: 
 1041:     ARlist = [hd(mnesia:dirty_read(Tab, K)) || K <- lists:seq(1, 10)],
 1042:     ?match({'EXIT',{aborted,{bad_type,_}}},
 1043:            mnesia:dirty_write(Tab, #new_replica_management{})),
 1044:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write(Tab, {last_rec, k, v, e, dummy})),
 1045: 
 1046:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 1047: 
 1048: schema_availability(doc) ->
 1049:     ["Test that schema succeeds (or fails) as intended when some db nodes are down."];
 1050: schema_availability(suite) ->
 1051:     [];
 1052: schema_availability(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1053:     [N1, _N2, N3] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(3, Config),
 1054:     Tab = schema_availability,
 1055:     Storage = mnesia_test_lib:storage_type(ram_copies, Config),
 1056:     Def1 = [{Storage, [N1, N3]}],
 1057:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab, Def1)),
 1058: 
 1059:     N = 10,
 1060:     ?match(ok, mnesia:sync_dirty(fun() -> [mnesia:write({Tab, K, K + 2}) || K <- lists:seq(1, N)], ok end)),
 1061:     ?match({[N,0,N], []}, rpc:multicall(Nodes, mnesia, table_info, [Tab, size])),
 1062:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([N3])),
 1063:     ?match({[N,0,0], []}, rpc:multicall(Nodes, mnesia, table_info, [Tab, size])),
 1064: 
 1065:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia([N3], [Tab])),
 1066:     ?match({[N,0,N], []}, rpc:multicall(Nodes, mnesia, table_info, [Tab, size])),
 1067:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([N3])),
 1068: 
 1069:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:clear_table(Tab)),
 1070:     ?match({[0,0,0], []}, rpc:multicall(Nodes, mnesia, table_info, [Tab, size])),
 1071: 
 1072:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia([N3], [Tab])),
 1073:     ?match({[0,0,0], []}, rpc:multicall(Nodes, mnesia, table_info, [Tab, size])),
 1074: 
 1075:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 1076: 
 1077: -define(badrpc(Tab), {badrpc, {'EXIT', {aborted,{no_exists,Tab}}}}).
 1078: 
 1079: local_content(doc) ->
 1080:     ["Test local_content functionality, we want to see that correct"
 1081:      " properties gets propageted correctly between nodes"];
 1082: local_content(suite) -> [];
 1083: local_content(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1084:     [Node1, Node2, Node3] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(3, Config), 
 1085:     Tab1 = local1,
 1086:     Def1 = [{local_content, true}, {ram_copies, Nodes}],
 1087:     Tab2 = local2,
 1088:     Def2 = [{local_content, true}, {disc_copies, [Node1]}],
 1089:     Tab3 = local3,
 1090:     Def3 = [{local_content, true}, {disc_only_copies, [Node1]}],
 1091:     Tab4 = local4,
 1092:     Def4 = [{local_content, true}, {ram_copies, [Node1]}],
 1093: 
 1094:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab1, Def1)),
 1095:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab2, Def2)),
 1096:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab3, Def3)),
 1097:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab4, Def4)),
 1098: 
 1099:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, dirty_write, [{Tab1, 1, Node1}])),
 1100:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, dirty_write, [{Tab1, 1, Node2}])),
 1101:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(Node3, mnesia, dirty_write, [{Tab1, 1, Node3}])),
 1102:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, dirty_write, [{Tab2, 1, Node1}])),
 1103:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, dirty_write, [{Tab3, 1, Node1}])),
 1104:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, dirty_write, [{Tab4, 1, Node1}])),
 1105: 
 1106:     ?match(?badrpc(Tab2), rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, dirty_write, [{Tab2, 1, Node2}])),
 1107:     ?match(?badrpc(Tab3), rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, dirty_write, [{Tab3, 1, Node2}])),
 1108:     ?match(?badrpc(Tab4), rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, dirty_write, [{Tab4, 1, Node2}])),
 1109: 
 1110:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, add_table_copy, [Tab2, Node2, ram_copies])),    
 1111:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, add_table_copy, [Tab3, Node2, disc_copies])),
 1112:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(Node3, mnesia, add_table_copy, [Tab4, Node2, disc_only_copies])),
 1113:     ?match([], rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab2, 1}])),
 1114:     ?match([], rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab3, 1}])),
 1115:     ?match([], rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab4, 1}])),
 1116: 
 1117:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, dirty_write, [{Tab2, 1, Node2}])),
 1118:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, dirty_write, [{Tab3, 1, Node2}])),
 1119:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, dirty_write, [{Tab4, 1, Node2}])),
 1120: 
 1121:     ?match([{Tab1, 1, Node1}], rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab1, 1}])),
 1122:     ?match([{Tab2, 1, Node1}], rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab2, 1}])),
 1123:     ?match([{Tab3, 1, Node1}], rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab3, 1}])),
 1124:     ?match([{Tab4, 1, Node1}], rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab4, 1}])),
 1125: 
 1126:     ?match([{Tab1, 1, Node2}], rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab1, 1}])),
 1127:     ?match([{Tab2, 1, Node2}], rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab2, 1}])),
 1128:     ?match([{Tab3, 1, Node2}], rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab3, 1}])),
 1129:     ?match([{Tab4, 1, Node2}], rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab4, 1}])),
 1130: 
 1131:     ?match([{Tab1, 1, Node3}], rpc:call(Node3, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab1, 1}])),
 1132:     ?match(?badrpc([_Tab2, 1]), rpc:call(Node3, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab2, 1}])),
 1133:     ?match(?badrpc([_Tab3, 1]), rpc:call(Node3, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab3, 1}])),
 1134:     ?match(?badrpc([_Tab4, 1]), rpc:call(Node3, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab4, 1}])),
 1135: 
 1136:     ?match({atomic, ok}, 
 1137: 	   mnesia:change_table_copy_type(schema, Node3, ram_copies)),
 1138:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:stop_mnesia([Node3])),
 1139: 
 1140:     %% Added for OTP-44306
 1141:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(Node3, mnesia, start, [[{schema, ?BACKEND}]])),
 1142:     ?match({ok, _}, mnesia:change_config(extra_db_nodes, [Node3])),
 1143: 
 1144:     mnesia_test_lib:sync_tables([Node3], [Tab1]),
 1145: 
 1146:     ?match([], rpc:call(Node3, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab1, 1}])),
 1147: 
 1148:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, clear_table, [Tab1])),
 1149:     
 1150:     SyncedCheck = fun(Tab) ->
 1151: 			  mnesia:lock({record,Tab,0}, write),
 1152: 			  {OK, []} = rpc:multicall(Nodes, mnesia, table_info, [Tab, size]),
 1153: 			  OK
 1154: 		  end,
 1155:     ?match({atomic, [0,1,0]}, mnesia:transaction(SyncedCheck, [Tab1])),
 1156:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, clear_table, [Tab2])),    
 1157:     ?match({atomic, [1,0,0]}, mnesia:transaction(SyncedCheck, [Tab2])),
 1158:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, clear_table, [Tab3])),    
 1159:     ?match({atomic, [1,0,0]}, mnesia:transaction(SyncedCheck, [Tab3])),
 1160: 
 1161:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 1162: 
 1163: 
 1164: change_table_access_mode(suite) -> [];
 1165: change_table_access_mode(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1166:     [Node1, Node2, Node3] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(3, Config),
 1167:     Tab = test_access_mode_tab,
 1168: 
 1169:     Def = case  mnesia_test_lib:diskless(Config) of
 1170: 	      true -> [{name, Tab}, {ram_copies, Nodes}];
 1171: 	      false -> [{name, Tab}, {ram_copies, [Node1]}, 
 1172: 			{disc_copies, [Node2]},
 1173: 			{disc_only_copies, [Node3]}]
 1174: 	  end,
 1175:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Def)),
 1176: 
 1177:     Write = fun(What) -> mnesia:write({Tab, 1, What}) end,
 1178:     Read = fun() -> mnesia:read({Tab, 1}) end,
 1179: 
 1180:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:transaction(Write, [test_ok])),
 1181:     %% test read_only
 1182:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:change_table_access_mode(Tab, read_only)),
 1183:     ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:transaction(Write, [nok])),
 1184:     ?match({'EXIT', {aborted, _}}, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, 1, [nok]})),
 1185:     ?match({aborted, _}, rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, transaction, [Write, [nok]])),
 1186:     ?match({aborted, _}, rpc:call(Node3, mnesia, transaction, [Write, [nok]])),
 1187:     ?match({atomic, [{Tab, 1, test_ok}]}, mnesia:transaction(Read)),
 1188:     %% test read_write
 1189:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:change_table_access_mode(Tab, read_write)),
 1190:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:transaction(Write, [test_ok1])),
 1191:     ?match({atomic, [{Tab, 1, test_ok1}]}, mnesia:transaction(Read)),
 1192:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, transaction, [Write, [test_ok2]])),
 1193:     ?match({atomic, [{Tab, 1, test_ok2}]}, mnesia:transaction(Read)),
 1194:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(Node3, mnesia, transaction, [Write, [test_ok3]])),
 1195:     ?match({atomic, [{Tab, 1, test_ok3}]}, mnesia:transaction(Read)),
 1196: 
 1197:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:delete_table(Tab)),
 1198: 
 1199:     Def4 = [{name, Tab}, {access_mode, read_only_bad}],
 1200:     ?match({aborted, {bad_type, _, _}}, mnesia:create_table(Def4)),
 1201: 
 1202:     Def2 = [{name, Tab}, {access_mode, read_only}],
 1203:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Def2)),
 1204:     ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:transaction(Write, [nok])),
 1205: 
 1206:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:change_table_access_mode(Tab, read_write)),
 1207:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:delete_table(Tab)),
 1208: 
 1209:     Def3 = [{name, Tab}, {mnesia_test_lib:storage_type(disc_copies, Config),
 1210: 			  [Node1, Node2]},
 1211: 	    {access_mode, read_write}],
 1212:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Def3)),
 1213:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:transaction(Write, [ok])),
 1214:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:change_table_access_mode(Tab, read_only)),
 1215:     ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:del_table_copy(Tab, Node2)),
 1216:     ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:del_table_copy(Tab, Node1)),
 1217:     ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:delete_table(Tab)),
 1218:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:change_table_access_mode(Tab, read_write)),
 1219: 
 1220:     ?match({aborted, {bad_type, _, _}},
 1221: 	   mnesia:change_table_access_mode(Tab, strange_atom)),
 1222:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:delete_table(Tab)),
 1223: 
 1224:     ?match({aborted, {no_exists, _}}, 
 1225: 	   mnesia:change_table_access_mode(err_tab, read_only)),
 1226:     ?match({aborted, {no_exists, _}}, 
 1227: 	   mnesia:change_table_access_mode([Tab], read_only)),
 1228:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 1229: 
 1230: change_table_load_order(suite) -> [];
 1231: change_table_load_order(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1232:     [Node1, Node2, Node3] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(3, Config),
 1233:     Tab1 = load_order_tab1,
 1234:     Tab2 = load_order_tab2,
 1235:     Tab3 = load_order_tab3,
 1236: 
 1237:     Def = case mnesia_test_lib:diskless(Config) of
 1238: 	      true -> [{ram_copies, Nodes}]; 
 1239: 	      false ->		  
 1240: 		  [{ram_copies, [Node1]}, 
 1241: 		   {disc_copies, [Node2]},
 1242: 		   {disc_only_copies, [Node3]}]
 1243: 	  end,
 1244:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab1, Def)),
 1245:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab2, Def)),
 1246:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab3, Def)),
 1247: 
 1248:     ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:change_table_load_order(Tab1, should_be_integer)),       
 1249:     ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:change_table_load_order(err_tab, 5)),       
 1250:     ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:change_table_load_order([err_tab], 5)),       
 1251:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:change_table_load_order(Tab1, 5)),       
 1252:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:change_table_load_order(Tab2, 4)),    
 1253:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:change_table_load_order(Tab3, 73)),
 1254: 
 1255:     ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:change_table_load_order(schema, -32)),   
 1256: 
 1257:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 1258: 
 1259: set_master_nodes(suite) -> [];
 1260: set_master_nodes(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1261:     [Node1, Node2, Node3] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(3, Config),
 1262:     Tab1 = master_node_tab1,
 1263:     Tab2 = master_node_tab2,
 1264:     Tab3 = master_node_tab3,
 1265:     Def1 = [{ram_copies, [Node1, Node2]}],
 1266:     Def2 = [{disc_copies, [Node2, Node3]}],
 1267:     Def3 = [{disc_only_copies, [Node3, Node1]}],
 1268:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab1, Def1)),
 1269:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab2, Def2)),
 1270:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab3, Def3)),
 1271: 
 1272:     ?match({error, _}, mnesia:set_master_nodes(schema, ['hopefully@non.existing.node'])),
 1273:     ?match({error, _}, mnesia:set_master_nodes(badtab, [Node2, Node3])),
 1274:     ?match({error, _}, mnesia:set_master_nodes(Tab1, [Node3])),
 1275:     ?match([], mnesia:table_info(Tab1, master_nodes)),
 1276: 
 1277:     ?match(ok, mnesia:set_master_nodes(schema, [Node3, Node1])),
 1278:     ?match([Node3, Node1], mnesia:table_info(schema, master_nodes)),
 1279:     ?match(ok, mnesia:set_master_nodes(Tab1, [Node2])),
 1280:     ?match([Node2], mnesia:table_info(Tab1, master_nodes)),
 1281:     ?match(ok, mnesia:set_master_nodes(Tab1, [Node2, Node1])),
 1282:     ?match([Node2, Node1], mnesia:table_info(Tab1, master_nodes)),
 1283:     ?match(ok, mnesia:set_master_nodes(Tab2, [Node2])),  % Should set where_to_read to Node2!
 1284:     ?match([Node2], mnesia:table_info(Tab2, master_nodes)),
 1285:     ?match(ok, mnesia:set_master_nodes(Tab3, [Node3])),
 1286:     ?match([Node3], mnesia:table_info(Tab3, master_nodes)),
 1287:     ?match(ok, mnesia:set_master_nodes(Tab3, [])),
 1288:     ?match([], mnesia:table_info(Tab3, master_nodes)),
 1289: 
 1290:     ?match(ok, mnesia:set_master_nodes([Node1])),
 1291:     ?match([Node1], mnesia:table_info(schema, master_nodes)),
 1292:     ?match([Node1], mnesia:table_info(Tab1, master_nodes)),
 1293:     ?match([], mnesia:table_info(Tab2, master_nodes)),
 1294:     ?match([Node1], mnesia:table_info(Tab3, master_nodes)),
 1295: 
 1296:     ?match(ok, mnesia:set_master_nodes([Node1, Node2])),
 1297:     ?match([Node1, Node2], mnesia:table_info(schema, master_nodes)),
 1298:     ?match([Node1, Node2], mnesia:table_info(Tab1, master_nodes)),
 1299:     ?match([Node2], mnesia:table_info(Tab2, master_nodes)),
 1300:     ?match([Node1], mnesia:table_info(Tab3, master_nodes)),
 1301: 
 1302:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 1303: 
 1304: offline_set_master_nodes(suite) -> [];
 1305: offline_set_master_nodes(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1306:     [Node] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(1, Config),
 1307:     Tab1 = offline_master_node_tab1,
 1308:     Tab2 = offline_master_node_tab2,
 1309:     Tab3 = offline_master_node_tab3,
 1310:     Tabs = ?sort([Tab1, Tab2, Tab3]),
 1311:     Def1 = [{ram_copies, [Node]}],
 1312:     Def2 = [{disc_copies, [Node]}],
 1313:     Def3 = [{disc_only_copies, [Node]}],
 1314:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab1, Def1)),
 1315:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab2, Def2)),
 1316:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab3, Def3)),
 1317:     ?match([], mnesia:system_info(master_node_tables)),
 1318:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:stop_mnesia([Node])),
 1319: 
 1320:     ?match(ok, mnesia:set_master_nodes(Tab1, [Node])),
 1321:     ?match(ok, mnesia:set_master_nodes(Tab2, [Node])),
 1322:     ?match(ok, mnesia:set_master_nodes(Tab3, [Node])),
 1323:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia([Node])),
 1324:     ?match(Tabs, ?sort(mnesia:system_info(master_node_tables))),
 1325: 
 1326:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:stop_mnesia([Node])),
 1327:     ?match(ok, mnesia:set_master_nodes(Tab1, [])),
 1328:     ?match(ok, mnesia:set_master_nodes(Tab2, [])),
 1329:     ?match(ok, mnesia:set_master_nodes(Tab3, [])),
 1330:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia([Node])),
 1331:     ?match([], mnesia:system_info(master_node_tables)),
 1332: 
 1333:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:stop_mnesia([Node])),
 1334:     ?match(ok, mnesia:set_master_nodes([Node])),
 1335:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia([Node])),
 1336:     AllTabs = ?sort([schema | Tabs]),
 1337:     ?match(AllTabs, ?sort(mnesia:system_info(master_node_tables))),
 1338: 
 1339:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:stop_mnesia([Node])),
 1340:     ?match(ok, mnesia:set_master_nodes([])),
 1341:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia([Node])),
 1342:     ?match([], mnesia:system_info(master_node_tables)),
 1343: 
 1344:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 1345: 
 1346: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1347: %% Synchronize table with log or disc
 1348: %%
 1349: 
 1350: %% Dump ram tables on disc
 1351: dump_tables(suite) -> [];
 1352: dump_tables(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1353:     [Node1, Node2] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
 1354:     Tab = dump_tables,
 1355:     Schema = [{name, Tab}, {attributes, [k, v]}, {ram_copies, [Node2]}],
 1356:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Schema)),
 1357: 
 1358:     %% Dump 10 records
 1359:     Size = 10,
 1360:     Keys = lists:seq(1, Size),
 1361:     Records = [{Tab, A, 7} || A <- Keys],
 1362:     lists:foreach(fun(Rec) -> ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write(Rec)) end, Records),
 1363: 
 1364:     AllKeys = fun() -> ?sort(mnesia:all_keys(Tab)) end,
 1365: 
 1366:     ?match({atomic, Keys}, mnesia:transaction(AllKeys)),
 1367:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:dump_tables([Tab])),
 1368: 
 1369:     %% Delete one record
 1370:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_delete({Tab, 5})),
 1371:     Keys2 = lists:delete(5, Keys),
 1372: 
 1373:     ?match({atomic, Keys2}, mnesia:transaction(AllKeys)),
 1374: 
 1375:     %% Check that all 10 is restored after a stop
 1376:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:stop_mnesia([Node1, Node2])),
 1377:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia([Node1, Node2])),
 1378:     ?match(ok, mnesia:wait_for_tables([Tab], infinity)),
 1379: 
 1380:     ?match({atomic, Keys}, mnesia:transaction(AllKeys)),
 1381: 
 1382:     ?match({aborted,Reason} when element(1, Reason) == no_exists,
 1383:            mnesia:dump_tables([foo])),
 1384:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 1385: 
 1386: dump_log(suite) -> [];
 1387: dump_log(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1388:     [Node1, Node2] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
 1389:     Tab = dump_log,
 1390:     Schema = [{name, Tab}, {attributes, [k, v]}, {ram_copies, [Node1, Node2]}],
 1391:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Schema)),
 1392:     Tab1 = dump_log1,
 1393:     Schema1 = [{name, Tab1}, {attributes, [k, v]}, {disc_copies, [Node1]}],
 1394:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Schema1)),
 1395:     Tab2 = dump_log2,
 1396:     Schema2 = [{name, Tab2}, {attributes, [k, v]}, {disc_only_copies, [Node1]}],
 1397:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Schema2)),
 1398: 
 1399:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, 1, ok})),
 1400:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab1, 1, ok})),
 1401:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab2, 1, ok})),
 1402: 
 1403:     ?match(dumped, mnesia:dump_log()),
 1404:     ?match(dumped, rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, dump_log, [])),
 1405: 
 1406:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:change_table_copy_type(schema, Node2, ram_copies)),
 1407:     ?match(dumped, rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, dump_log, [])),
 1408: 
 1409:     Self = self(),
 1410:     spawn(fun() -> dump_log(100, Self) end),
 1411:     spawn(fun() -> dump_log(100, Self) end),
 1412: 
 1413:     ?match(ok, receive finished -> ok after 3000 -> timeout end),
 1414:     ?match(ok, receive finished -> ok after 3000 -> timeout end),
 1415:     
 1416:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 1417: 
 1418: dump_log(N, Tester) when N > 0 ->
 1419:     mnesia:dump_log(),
 1420:     dump_log(N-1, Tester);
 1421: dump_log(_, Tester) ->
 1422:     Tester ! finished.
 1423: 
 1424: 
 1425: wait_for_tables(doc) -> 
 1426:     ["Intf. test of wait_for_tables, see also force_load_table"];
 1427: wait_for_tables(suite) -> [];
 1428: wait_for_tables(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1429:     [Node1, Node2] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
 1430:     Tab = wf_tab,
 1431:     Schema = [{name, Tab}, {ram_copies, [Node1, Node2]}],
 1432:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Schema)),
 1433:     ?match(ok, mnesia:wait_for_tables([wf_tab], infinity)),
 1434:     ?match(ok, mnesia:wait_for_tables([], timer:seconds(5))),
 1435:     ?match({timeout, [bad_tab]}, mnesia:wait_for_tables([bad_tab], timer:seconds(5))),
 1436:     ?match(ok, mnesia:wait_for_tables([wf_tab], 0)),
 1437:     ?match({error,_}, mnesia:wait_for_tables([wf_tab], -1)),
 1438:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 1439: 
 1440: force_load_table(suite) -> [];
 1441: force_load_table(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1442:     [Node1, Node2] = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
 1443:     Tab = wf_tab,
 1444: 
 1445:     Schema = [{name, Tab}, {disc_copies, [Node1, Node2]}],
 1446:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Schema)),
 1447:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, 1, test_ok})),
 1448:     mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([Node1]),
 1449:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, dirty_write, [{Tab, 1, test_nok}])),
 1450:     mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([Node2]),
 1451:     %%    timer:sleep(timer:seconds(5)),
 1452:     ?match(ok, mnesia:start()),
 1453:     ?match({timeout, [Tab]}, mnesia:wait_for_tables([Tab], 5)),
 1454:     ?match({'EXIT', _}, mnesia:dirty_read({Tab, 1})),
 1455:     ?match(yes, mnesia:force_load_table(Tab)),
 1456:     ?match([{Tab, 1, test_ok}], mnesia:dirty_read({Tab, 1})),
 1457: 
 1458:     ?match({error, _}, mnesia:force_load_table(error_tab)),
 1459:     ?verify_mnesia([Node1], [Node2]).
 1460: 
 1461: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1462: 
 1463: user_properties(doc) ->
 1464:     ["Test of reading, writing and deletion of user properties",
 1465:      "Plus initialization of user properties when a table is created",
 1466:      "Do also test mnesia:table_info(Tab, user_properties)"];
 1467: user_properties(suite) -> [];
 1468: user_properties(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1469:     [Node] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(1, Config),
 1470:     Tab1 = user_properties_1,
 1471:     Tab2 = user_properties_2,
 1472:     Tab3 = user_properties_3,
 1473:     Def1 = [{ram_copies, [Node]}, {user_properties, []}],
 1474:     Def2 = [{mnesia_test_lib:storage_type(disc_copies, Config), [Node]}],
 1475:     Def3 = [{mnesia_test_lib:storage_type(disc_only_copies, Config), [Node]}, 
 1476: 	    {user_properties, []}],
 1477: 
 1478:     PropKey = my_prop,
 1479:     Prop = {PropKey, some, elements},
 1480:     Prop2 = {PropKey, some, other, elements},
 1481:     YourProp= {your_prop},
 1482:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab1, Def1)),
 1483:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab2, Def2)),
 1484:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab3, Def3)),
 1485: 
 1486:     ?match([], mnesia:table_info(Tab1, user_properties)),
 1487:     ?match([], mnesia:table_info(Tab2, user_properties)),
 1488:     ?match([], mnesia:table_info(Tab3, user_properties)),
 1489: 
 1490:     ?match({'EXIT', {aborted, {no_exists, {Tab1, user_property, PropKey}}}},
 1491: 	   mnesia:read_table_property(Tab1, PropKey)),
 1492:     ?match({'EXIT', {aborted, {no_exists, {Tab2, user_property, PropKey}}}},
 1493: 	   mnesia:read_table_property(Tab2, PropKey)),
 1494:     ?match({'EXIT', {aborted, {no_exists, {Tab3, user_property, PropKey}}}},
 1495: 	   mnesia:read_table_property(Tab3, PropKey)),
 1496: 
 1497:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:write_table_property(Tab1, Prop)),
 1498:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:write_table_property(Tab2, Prop)),
 1499:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:write_table_property(Tab3, Prop)),
 1500:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:write_table_property(Tab1, YourProp)),
 1501:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:write_table_property(Tab2, YourProp)),
 1502:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:write_table_property(Tab3, YourProp)),
 1503: 
 1504:     ?match(Prop, mnesia:read_table_property(Tab1, PropKey)),
 1505:     ?match(Prop, mnesia:read_table_property(Tab2, PropKey)),
 1506:     ?match(Prop, mnesia:read_table_property(Tab3, PropKey)),
 1507: 
 1508:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:write_table_property(Tab1, Prop2)),
 1509:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:write_table_property(Tab2, Prop2)),
 1510:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:write_table_property(Tab3, Prop2)),
 1511:     ?match(Prop2, mnesia:read_table_property(Tab1, PropKey)),
 1512:     ?match(Prop2, mnesia:read_table_property(Tab2, PropKey)),
 1513:     ?match(Prop2, mnesia:read_table_property(Tab3, PropKey)),
 1514: 
 1515:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:delete_table_property(Tab1, PropKey)),
 1516:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:delete_table_property(Tab2, PropKey)),
 1517:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:delete_table_property(Tab3, PropKey)),
 1518: 
 1519:     ?match([YourProp], mnesia:table_info(Tab1, user_properties)),
 1520:     ?match([YourProp], mnesia:table_info(Tab2, user_properties)),
 1521:     ?match([YourProp], mnesia:table_info(Tab3, user_properties)),
 1522: 
 1523:     Tab4 = user_properties_4,
 1524:     ?match({atomic, ok}, 
 1525: 	   mnesia:create_table(Tab4, [{user_properties, [Prop]}])),
 1526: 
 1527:     ?match([Prop], mnesia:table_info(Tab4, user_properties)),
 1528: 
 1529:     %% Some error cases
 1530: 
 1531:     ?match({aborted, {bad_type, Tab1, {}}},
 1532: 	   mnesia:write_table_property(Tab1, {})),
 1533:     ?match({aborted, {bad_type, Tab1, ali}},
 1534: 	   mnesia:write_table_property(Tab1, ali)),
 1535: 
 1536:     Tab5 = user_properties_5,
 1537:     ?match({aborted, {bad_type, Tab5, {user_properties, {}}}}, 
 1538: 	   mnesia:create_table(Tab5, [{user_properties, {}}])),
 1539:     ?match({aborted, {bad_type, Tab5, {user_properties, ali}}}, 
 1540: 	   mnesia:create_table(Tab5, [{user_properties, ali}])),
 1541:     ?match({aborted, {bad_type, Tab5, {user_properties, [{}]}}}, 
 1542: 	   mnesia:create_table(Tab5, [{user_properties, [{}]}])),
 1543:     ?match({aborted, {bad_type, Tab5, {user_properties, [ali]}}}, 
 1544: 	   mnesia:create_table(Tab5, [{user_properties, [ali]}])),
 1545: 
 1546:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 1547: 
 1548: 
 1549: unsupp_user_props(doc) ->
 1550:     ["Simple test of adding user props in a schema_transaction"];
 1551: unsupp_user_props(suite) -> [];
 1552: unsupp_user_props(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1553:     [Node1] = ?acquire_nodes(1, Config),
 1554:     Tab1 = silly1,
 1555:     Tab2 = silly2,
 1556:     Storage = mnesia_test_lib:storage_type(ram_copies, Config),
 1557: 
 1558:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia,
 1559: 				  create_table, [Tab1, [{Storage, [Node1]}]])),
 1560:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia,
 1561: 				  create_table, [Tab2, [{Storage, [Node1]}]])),
 1562: 
 1563:     F1 = fun() ->
 1564: 		 mnesia_schema:do_write_table_property(
 1565: 		   silly1, {prop, propval1}),
 1566: 		 mnesia_schema:do_write_table_property(
 1567: 		   silly2, {prop, propval2}), % same key as above
 1568: 		 mnesia_schema:do_write_table_property(
 1569: 		   schema, {prop, propval3})  % same key as above
 1570: 	 end,
 1571:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia_schema,
 1572: 				  schema_transaction, [F1])),
 1573: 
 1574:     ?match([{prop,propval1}], rpc:call(Node1, mnesia,
 1575: 				       table_info, [silly1, user_properties])),
 1576:     ?match([{prop,propval2}], rpc:call(Node1, mnesia,
 1577: 				       table_info, [silly2, user_properties])),
 1578:     ?match([_,{prop,propval3}], rpc:call(Node1, mnesia,
 1579: 				       table_info, [schema, user_properties])),
 1580: 
 1581:     F2 = fun() ->
 1582: 		 mnesia_schema:do_write_table_property(
 1583: 		   silly1, {prop, propval1a}),
 1584: 		 mnesia_schema:do_write_table_property(
 1585: 		   silly1, {prop, propval1b})  % same key as above
 1586: 	 end,
 1587:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia_schema,
 1588: 				  schema_transaction, [F2])),
 1589: 
 1590:     ?match([{prop,propval1b}], rpc:call(Node1, mnesia,
 1591: 					table_info,
 1592: 					[silly1, user_properties])),
 1593:     ?verify_mnesia([Node1], []).
 1594: 
 1595: 
 1596: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1597: 
 1598: 
 1599: snmp_open_table(suite) -> [];
 1600: snmp_open_table(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1601:     [Node1, Node2] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
 1602:     Tab1 = local_snmp_table,
 1603: 
 1604:     Storage = mnesia_test_lib:storage_type(disc_copies, Config),
 1605:     Def1 = 
 1606: 	case mnesia_test_lib:diskless(Config) of
 1607: 	    true -> [{ram_copies, Nodes}];
 1608: 	    false ->		
 1609: 		[{disc_copies, [Node1]}, {ram_copies, [Node2]}]
 1610: 	end,
 1611: 
 1612:     Tab2 = ext_snmp_table,
 1613:     Def2 = [{Storage, [Node2]}],
 1614:     ErrTab = non_existing_tab,
 1615:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab1, Def1)),
 1616:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab2, Def2)),
