 1617:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:snmp_open_table(Tab1, [{key, integer}])),
 1618:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:snmp_open_table(Tab2, [{key, integer}])),
 1619:     ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:snmp_open_table(ErrTab, [{key, integer}])),
 1620:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 1621: 
 1622: snmp_close_table(suite) -> [];
 1623: snmp_close_table(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1624:     [Node1, Node2] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
 1625:     Tab1 = local_snmp_table,
 1626:     Storage = mnesia_test_lib:storage_type(disc_copies, Config),
 1627:     Def1 = 
 1628: 	case mnesia_test_lib:diskless(Config) of
 1629: 	    true -> [{ram_copies, Nodes}];
 1630: 	    false ->		
 1631: 		[{disc_copies, [Node1]}, {ram_copies, [Node2]}]
 1632: 	end,
 1633: 
 1634:     Tab2 = ext_snmp_table,
 1635:     Def2 = [{snmp, [{key, integer}]}, {Storage, [Node2]}],
 1636:     ErrTab = non_existing_tab,
 1637:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab1, Def1)),
 1638:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab2, Def2)),
 1639:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(no_snmp_tab, [])),
 1640:     add_some_records(Tab1, Tab2, 3),    
 1641:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:snmp_open_table(Tab1, [{key, integer}])),    
 1642:     add_some_records(Tab1, Tab2, 5),    
 1643:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:snmp_close_table(Tab1)),
 1644: 
 1645:     Transform = fun(Tab, Key) ->
 1646: 			[{T,K,V}] = mnesia:read(Tab, Key, write),
 1647: 			mnesia:delete(T,K, write),
 1648: 			mnesia:write({T, {K,K}, V, 43+V})
 1649: 		end,
 1650:     
 1651:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:transform_table(Tab1, ignore, [key,val,new])),
 1652:     ?match({atomic, ok},
 1653: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() ->
 1654: 				      mnesia:write_lock_table(Tab1),
 1655: 				      Keys = mnesia:select(Tab1, [{{'_','$1','_'}, [],
 1656: 								   ['$1']}]),
 1657: 				      [Transform(Tab1, Key) || Key <- Keys],
 1658: 				      ok
 1659: 			      end)),
 1660:     ?match([{Tab1, {1, 1}, 1, 44}], mnesia:dirty_read(Tab1, {1, 1})),
 1661:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:snmp_open_table(Tab1, [{key,{integer,integer}}])),
 1662: 
 1663:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:snmp_close_table(Tab2)),
 1664:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:transform_table(Tab2, ignore, [key,val,new])),
 1665:     ?match({atomic, ok},
 1666: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() ->
 1667: 				      mnesia:write_lock_table(Tab2),
 1668: 				      Keys = mnesia:select(Tab2, [{{'_','$1','_'}, [],
 1669: 								   ['$1']}]),
 1670: 				      [Transform(Tab2, Key) || Key <- Keys],
 1671: 				      ok
 1672: 			      end)),
 1673:     
 1674:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:snmp_open_table(Tab2, [{key,{integer,integer}}])), 
 1675:     
 1676:     %% Should be aborted ????
 1677:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:snmp_close_table(no_snmp_tab)),
 1678:     ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:snmp_close_table(ErrTab)),
 1679:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 1680: 
 1681: snmp_get_next_index(suite) -> [];
 1682: snmp_get_next_index(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1683:     [Node1, Node2] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
 1684:     Tab1 = local_snmp_table,
 1685:     Storage = mnesia_test_lib:storage_type(disc_copies, Config),
 1686:     Def1 = 
 1687: 	case mnesia_test_lib:diskless(Config) of
 1688: 	    true -> [{ram_copies, Nodes}];
 1689: 	    false ->		
 1690: 		[{disc_copies, [Node1]}, {ram_copies, [Node2]}]
 1691: 	end,
 1692: 
 1693:     Tab2 = ext_snmp_table,
 1694:     Def2 = [{Storage, [Node2]}],
 1695:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab1, Def1)),
 1696:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab2, Def2)),
 1697:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:snmp_open_table(Tab1, [{key, integer}])),
 1698:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:snmp_open_table(Tab2, [{key, integer}])),
 1699:     add_some_records(Tab1, Tab2, 1),
 1700:     Test = 
 1701: 	fun() ->
 1702: 		%% Test local tables
 1703: 		{success, Res11} = ?match({ok, _}, mnesia:snmp_get_next_index(Tab1,[])),
 1704: 		{ok, Index11} = Res11,
 1705: 		{success, _Res12} = 
 1706: 		    ?match(endOfTable, mnesia:snmp_get_next_index(Tab1, Index11)),
 1707: 		?match({'EXIT',_}, mnesia:snmp_get_next_index(Tab1, endOfTable)),
 1708: 
 1709: 		%% Test external table
 1710: 		{success, Res21} =
 1711: 		    ?match({ok, _}, mnesia:snmp_get_next_index(Tab2, [])),
 1712: 		{ok, Index21} = Res21,
 1713: 		{success, _Res22} = 
 1714: 		    ?match(endOfTable, mnesia:snmp_get_next_index(Tab2, Index21)),
 1715: 
 1716: 		{ok, Row} = mnesia:snmp_get_row(Tab1, Index11),		
 1717: 		?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_delete(Tab1, hd(Index11))),
 1718: 
 1719: 		?match(endOfTable, mnesia:snmp_get_next_index(Tab1,[])),
 1720: 
 1721: 		ok = mnesia:dirty_write(Row), %% Reset to coming tests
 1722: 
 1723: 		%% Test of non existing table
 1724: 		%%?match(endOfTable, mnesia:snmp_get_next_index(ErrTab, [])),
 1725: 		ok
 1726: 	end,
 1727:     ?match(ok, Test()),
 1728:     ?match({atomic,ok}, mnesia:transaction(Test)),
 1729:     ?match(ok, mnesia:sync_dirty(Test)),
 1730:     ?match(ok, mnesia:activity(transaction,Test,mnesia)),
 1731: 
 1732:     %%io:format("**********Before ~p~n", [mnesia_lib:val({Tab1,snmp})]),
 1733:     %%io:format(" ~p ~n", [ets:tab2list(mnesia_lib:val({local_snmp_table,{index,snmp}}))]),
 1734:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:stop_mnesia(Nodes)),
 1735:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia(Nodes, [Tab1, Tab2])),
 1736:     %%io:format("**********After ~p~n", [mnesia_lib:val({Tab1,snmp})]),
 1737:     %%io:format(" ~p ~n", [ets:tab2list(mnesia_lib:val({local_snmp_table,{index,snmp}}))]),
 1738: 
 1739:     ?match(ok, Test()),
 1740:     ?match({atomic,ok}, mnesia:transaction(Test)),
 1741:     ?match(ok, mnesia:sync_dirty(Test)),
 1742:     ?match(ok, mnesia:activity(transaction,Test,mnesia)),
 1743: 
 1744:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 1745: 
 1746: add_some_records(Tab1, Tab2, N) ->
 1747:     Recs1 = [{Tab1, I, I} || I <- lists:reverse(lists:seq(1, N))],
 1748:     Recs2 = [{Tab2, I, I} || I <- lists:reverse(lists:seq(20, 20+N-1))],
 1749:     lists:foreach(fun(R) -> mnesia:dirty_write(R) end, Recs1),
 1750:     Fun = fun(R) -> mnesia:write(R) end,
 1751:     Trans = fun() -> lists:foreach(Fun, Recs2) end, 
 1752:     {atomic, ok} = mnesia:transaction(Trans),
 1753:     %% Sync things, so everything gets everywhere!
 1754:     {atomic, ok} = mnesia:sync_transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write(lists:last(Recs1)) end),
 1755:     {atomic, ok} = mnesia:sync_transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write(lists:last(Recs2)) end),
 1756:     ?sort(Recs1 ++ Recs2).
 1757: 
 1758: snmp_get_row(suite) -> [];
 1759: snmp_get_row(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1760:     [Node1, Node2] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
 1761:     Tab1 = local_snmp_table,
 1762:     Storage = mnesia_test_lib:storage_type(disc_copies, Config),
 1763:     Def1 = 
 1764: 	case mnesia_test_lib:diskless(Config) of
 1765: 	    true -> [{ram_copies, Nodes}];
 1766: 	    false ->		
 1767: 		[{disc_copies, [Node1]}, {ram_copies, [Node2]}]
 1768: 	end,
 1769:     Tab2 = ext_snmp_table,
 1770:     Def2 = [{Storage, [Node2]}],
 1771:     Tab3 = snmp_table,
 1772:     Def3 = [{Storage, [Node1]}, 
 1773:             {attributes, [key, data1, data2]}],    
 1774: 
 1775:     Setup = fun() ->
 1776: 		    ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab1, Def1)),
 1777: 		    ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab2, Def2)),
 1778: 		    ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab3, Def3)),
 1779: 		    ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:snmp_open_table(Tab1, [{key, integer}])),
 1780: 		    ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:snmp_open_table(Tab2, [{key, integer}])),
 1781: 		    ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:snmp_open_table(
 1782: 					   Tab3, [{key, {fix_string,integer}}])),
 1783: 		    add_some_records(Tab1, Tab2, 1)
 1784: 	    end,
 1785:     Clear = fun() ->
 1786: 		    ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:delete_table(Tab1)),
 1787: 		    ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:delete_table(Tab2)),
 1788: 		    ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:delete_table(Tab3))
 1789: 	    end,
 1790:     Test = 
 1791: 	fun() ->
 1792: 		%% Test local tables
 1793: 		{success, Res11} = 
 1794: 		    ?match({ok, [1]}, mnesia:snmp_get_next_index(Tab1,[])),
 1795: 		{ok, Index11} = Res11,
 1796: 		?match({ok, {Tab1,1,1}}, mnesia:snmp_get_row(Tab1, Index11)),    
 1797: 		?match(endOfTable, mnesia:snmp_get_next_index(Tab1, Index11)),
 1798: 		?match({'EXIT',_}, mnesia:snmp_get_row(Tab1, endOfTable)),
 1799: 		?match(undefined, mnesia:snmp_get_row(Tab1, [73])),
 1800: 		
 1801: 		Add = fun() ->  mnesia:write({Tab3, {"f_string", 3}, data1, data2}) end,
 1802: 		?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:transaction(Add)),
 1803:                 {success, {ok, Index31}} = ?match({ok, RowIndex31} when is_list(RowIndex31), 
 1804: 						 mnesia:snmp_get_next_index(Tab3,[])),
 1805: 		?match({ok, Row31} when is_tuple(Row31), 
 1806: 					mnesia:snmp_get_row(Tab3, Index31)),
 1807: 		?match(endOfTable, mnesia:snmp_get_next_index(Tab3, Index31)),
 1808: 		Del = fun() -> mnesia:delete({Tab3,{"f_string",3}}) end,
 1809: 		?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:transaction(Del)),
 1810: 		?match(undefined, mnesia:snmp_get_row(Tab3, "f_string" ++ [3])),
 1811: 		?match(undefined, mnesia:snmp_get_row(Tab3, "f_string" ++ [73])),
 1812: 
 1813:                 %% Test external table
 1814:                 {success, Res21} = ?match({ok,[20]}, mnesia:snmp_get_next_index(Tab2, [])),
 1815: 		{ok, Index21} = Res21,
 1816:                 ?match({ok, Row2} when is_tuple(Row2), mnesia:snmp_get_row(Tab2, Index21)), 
 1817:                 ?match(endOfTable, mnesia:snmp_get_next_index(Tab2, Index21)),
 1818:                 %% Test of non existing table
 1819:                 %% ?match(endOfTable, mnesia:snmp_get_next_index(ErrTab, [])),
 1820:                 ok
 1821: 	end,
 1822:     Setup(),
 1823:     ?match(ok, Test()),
 1824:     Clear(), Setup(),
 1825:     ?match({atomic,ok}, mnesia:transaction(Test)),
 1826:     Clear(), Setup(),
 1827:     ?match(ok, mnesia:sync_dirty(Test)),
 1828:     Clear(), Setup(),
 1829:     ?match(ok, mnesia:activity(transaction,Test,mnesia)),
 1830: 
 1831:     Clear(), Setup(),
 1832:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:stop_mnesia(Nodes)),
 1833:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia(Nodes, [Tab1, Tab2])),
 1834:     ?match(ok, Test()),
 1835:     Clear(), Setup(),
 1836:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:stop_mnesia(Nodes)),
 1837:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia(Nodes, [Tab1, Tab2])),
 1838:     ?match({atomic,ok}, mnesia:transaction(Test)),
 1839: 
 1840:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 1841: 
 1842: snmp_get_mnesia_key(suite) -> [];
 1843: snmp_get_mnesia_key(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1844:     [Node1, Node2] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
 1845:     Tab1 = local_snmp_table,
 1846:     Storage = mnesia_test_lib:storage_type(disc_copies, Config),
 1847:     Def1 = 
 1848: 	case mnesia_test_lib:diskless(Config) of
 1849: 	    true -> [{ram_copies, Nodes}];
 1850: 	    false ->		
 1851: 		[{disc_copies, [Node1]}, {ram_copies, [Node2]}]
 1852: 	end,
 1853: 
 1854:     Tab2 = ext_snmp_table,
 1855:     Def2 = [{Storage, [Node2]}],
 1856: 
 1857:     Tab3 = fix_string,    
 1858:     Setup = fun() -> 
 1859: 		    ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab1, Def1)),
 1860: 		    ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab2, Def2)),
 1861: 		    ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab3, Def1)),
 1862: 		    ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:snmp_open_table(Tab1, [{key, integer}])),
 1863: 		    ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:snmp_open_table(Tab2, [{key, integer}])),
 1864: 		    ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:snmp_open_table(Tab3, [{key, {fix_string,integer}}])),
 1865: 
 1866: 		    add_some_records(Tab1, Tab2, 1)	    
 1867: 	    end,
 1868:     Clear = fun() ->
 1869: 		    ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:delete_table(Tab1)),
 1870: 		    ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:delete_table(Tab2)),
 1871: 		    ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:delete_table(Tab3))
 1872: 	    end,
 1873:     Test = 
 1874: 	fun() ->
 1875: 		%% Test local tables
 1876: 		{success, Res11} = 
 1877: 		    ?match({ok, [1]}, mnesia:snmp_get_next_index(Tab1,[])),
 1878: 		{ok, Index11} = Res11,
 1879: 		?match({ok, 1}, mnesia:snmp_get_mnesia_key(Tab1, Index11)),    
 1880: 		%% Test external tables
 1881: 		{success, Res21} =
 1882: 		    ?match({ok, [20]}, mnesia:snmp_get_next_index(Tab2, [])),
 1883: 		{ok, Index21} = Res21,
 1884: 		?match({ok, 20}, mnesia:snmp_get_mnesia_key(Tab2, Index21)),
 1885: 		?match(undefined, mnesia:snmp_get_mnesia_key(Tab2, [97])),
 1886: 		?match({'EXIT', _}, mnesia:snmp_get_mnesia_key(Tab2, 97)),
 1887: 
 1888: 		?match({atomic,ok}, mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:delete({Tab1,1}) end)),
 1889: 		?match(undefined, mnesia:snmp_get_mnesia_key(Tab1, Index11)),
 1890: 		
 1891: 		?match({atomic,ok},mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write({Tab1,73,7}) end)),
 1892: 		?match({ok, 73}, mnesia:snmp_get_mnesia_key(Tab1, [73])),
 1893: 		?match({atomic,ok}, mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:delete({Tab1,73}) end)),
 1894: 		?match(undefined, mnesia:snmp_get_mnesia_key(Tab1, [73])),
 1895: 
 1896: 		?match({atomic,ok},mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write({Tab3,{"S",5},7}) end)),
 1897: 		?match({ok,{"S",5}}, mnesia:snmp_get_mnesia_key(Tab3, [$S,5])),
 1898: 		?match({atomic,ok},mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:delete({Tab3,{"S",5}}) end)),
 1899: 		?match(undefined, mnesia:snmp_get_mnesia_key(Tab3, [$S,5])),
 1900: 
 1901: 		ok
 1902: 	end,
 1903:     Setup(),
 1904:     ?match(ok, Test()),
 1905:     Clear(), Setup(),
 1906:     ?match({atomic,ok}, mnesia:transaction(Test)),
 1907:     Clear(), Setup(),
 1908:     ?match(ok, mnesia:sync_dirty(Test)),
 1909:     Clear(), Setup(),
 1910:     ?match(ok, mnesia:activity(transaction,Test,mnesia)),
 1911:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 1912: 
 1913: snmp_update_counter(doc) ->
 1914:     ["Verify that counters may be updated for tables with SNMP property"];
 1915: snmp_update_counter(suite) -> [];
 1916: snmp_update_counter(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1917:     [Node1] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(1, Config),
 1918:     Tab = snmp_update_counter,
 1919:     Def = [{attributes, [key, value]},
 1920:            {snmp, [{key, integer}]},
 1921:            {ram_copies, [Node1]}
 1922:           ],
 1923:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab, Def)),
 1924:     Oid = {Tab, 1},
 1925:     ?match([], mnesia:dirty_read(Oid)),
 1926:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, 1, 1})),
 1927:     ?match([{Tab, _Key, 1}], mnesia:dirty_read(Oid)),
 1928:     ?match(3, mnesia:dirty_update_counter(Oid, 2)),
 1929:     ?match([{Tab, _Key, 3}], mnesia:dirty_read(Oid)),
 1930:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 1931: 
 1932: snmp_order(doc) ->
 1933:     ["Verify that sort order is correct in transactions and dirty variants"];
 1934: snmp_order(suite) -> [];
 1935: snmp_order(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1936:     [Node1] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(1, Config),
 1937:     Tab = snmp_order,
 1938:     Def = [{attributes, [key, value]},
 1939:            {snmp, [{key, {integer, integer, integer}}]},
 1940:            {ram_copies, [Node1]}
 1941:           ],
 1942:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab, Def)),
 1943:     Oid = {Tab, 1},
 1944:     ?match([], mnesia:dirty_read(Oid)),
 1945:     ?match({'EXIT', {aborted, _}}, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, 1, 1})),
 1946:     [mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, {A,B,2}, default}) ||
 1947: 	A <- lists:seq(1, 9, 2),
 1948: 	B <- lists:seq(2, 8, 2)],
 1949:     
 1950:     Test1 = fun() ->
 1951: 		    Keys0 = get_keys(Tab, []),
 1952: 		    ?match(Keys0, lists:sort(Keys0)),
 1953: 		    ?match([[1,2,2]|_], Keys0),
 1954: 		    Keys1 = get_keys(Tab, [5]),
 1955: 		    ?match(Keys1, lists:sort(Keys1)),
 1956: 		    ?match([[5,2,2]|_], Keys1),
 1957: 		    Keys2 = get_keys(Tab, [7, 4]),
 1958: 		    ?match(Keys2, lists:sort(Keys2)),
 1959: 		    ?match([[7,4,2]|_], Keys2),
 1960: 		    ok
 1961: 	    end,
 1962:     ?match(ok, Test1()),
 1963:     ?match({atomic, ok},mnesia:transaction(Test1)),
 1964:     ?match(ok,mnesia:sync_dirty(Test1)),
 1965:    
 1966:     Test2 = fun() ->
 1967: 		    mnesia:write(Tab, {Tab,{0,0,2},updated}, write),
 1968: 		    mnesia:write(Tab, {Tab,{5,3,2},updated}, write),
 1969: 		    mnesia:write(Tab, {Tab,{10,10,2},updated}, write),
 1970: 		    Keys0 = get_keys(Tab, []),
 1971: 		    ?match([[0,0,2],[1,2,2]|_], Keys0),
 1972: 		    ?match(Keys0, lists:sort(Keys0)),
 1973: 		    
 1974: 		    Keys1 = get_keys(Tab, [5]),
 1975: 		    ?match([[5,2,2],[5,3,2]|_], Keys1),
 1976: 		    ?match(Keys1, lists:sort(Keys1)),
 1977: 		    
 1978: 		    Keys2 = get_keys(Tab, [7,4]),
 1979: 		    ?match([[7,4,2]|_], Keys2),
 1980: 		    ?match(Keys2, lists:sort(Keys2)),
 1981: 		    ?match([10,10,2], lists:last(Keys0)),
 1982: 		    ?match([10,10,2], lists:last(Keys1)),
 1983: 		    ?match([10,10,2], lists:last(Keys2)),
 1984: 		    
 1985: 		    ?match([[10,10,2]], get_keys(Tab, [10])),
 1986: 		    ok
 1987: 	    end,
 1988: 
 1989:     ?match({atomic, ok},mnesia:transaction(Test2)),
 1990: 
 1991:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 1992: 
 1993: get_keys(Tab, Key) ->
 1994:     case mnesia:snmp_get_next_index(Tab, Key) of
 1995: 	endOfTable -> [];
 1996: 	{ok, Next} ->
 1997: 	    [Next|get_keys(Tab, Next)]
 1998:     end.
 1999: 
 2000: 
 2001: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2002: 
 2003: -record(tab, {i, e1, e2}).			% Simple test table
 2004: 
 2005: 
 2006: subscribe_extended(doc) ->
 2007:     ["Test the extended set of events, test with and without checkpoints. "];
 2008: subscribe_extended(suite) ->
 2009:     [];
 2010: subscribe_extended(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2011:     [N1, N2]=Nodes=?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
 2012:     Tab1 = etab,
 2013:     Storage = mnesia_test_lib:storage_type(ram_copies, Config),
 2014:     Def1 = [{Storage, [N1, N2]}, {attributes, record_info(fields, tab)}],
 2015:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab1, Def1)),
 2016: 
 2017:     Tab2 = bag,
 2018:     Def2 = [{Storage, [N1, N2]}, 
 2019: 	    {type, bag},
 2020: 	    {record_name, Tab1},
 2021: 	    {attributes, record_info(fields, tab)}],
 2022:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab2, Def2)),
 2023: 
 2024:     Tab3 = ctab,
 2025:     Def3 = [{Storage, [N1, N2]}],
 2026:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab3, Def3)),
 2027: 
 2028:     ?match({ok, N1}, mnesia:subscribe({table, Tab1, detailed})),
 2029:     ?match({ok, N1}, mnesia:subscribe({table, Tab2, detailed})),
 2030:     ?match({ok, N1}, mnesia:subscribe({table, Tab3, detailed})),
 2031: 
 2032:     ?match({error, {already_exists, _}}, mnesia:subscribe({table, Tab1, simple})),
 2033:     ?match({error, {badarg, {table, Tab1, bad}}}, mnesia:subscribe({table, Tab1, bad})),
 2034: 
 2035:     ?match({ok, N1}, mnesia:subscribe(activity)),
 2036:     test_ext_sub(Tab1, Tab2, Tab3),
 2037:     
 2038:     ?match({ok, N1}, mnesia:unsubscribe(activity)),
 2039:     ?match({ok, N1}, mnesia:subscribe({table, Tab1, detailed})),
 2040:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:clear_table(Tab1)),
 2041:     ?match({mnesia_table_event, {delete, schema, {schema, Tab1}, [{schema, Tab1, _}],_}}, recv_event()),
 2042:     ?match({mnesia_table_event, {write, schema, {schema, Tab1, _}, [], _}}, recv_event()),
 2043: 
 2044:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:clear_table(Tab2)),
 2045:     ?match({mnesia_table_event, {delete, schema, {schema, Tab2}, [{schema, Tab2, _}],_}}, 
 2046: 	   recv_event()),
 2047:     ?match({mnesia_table_event, {write, schema, {schema, Tab2, _}, [], _}}, recv_event()),
 2048: 
 2049:     ?match({ok, N1}, mnesia:unsubscribe({table, Tab2, detailed})),    
 2050:     {ok, _, _} = mnesia:activate_checkpoint([{name, testing}, 
 2051: 					     {ram_overrides_dump, true}, 
 2052: 					     {max, [Tab1, Tab2]}]),
 2053:     ?match({ok, N1}, mnesia:subscribe({table, Tab2, detailed})),
 2054:     ?match({ok, N1}, mnesia:subscribe(activity)),
 2055:     test_ext_sub(Tab1, Tab2, Tab3),
 2056: 
 2057:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 2058: 
 2059: test_ext_sub(Tab1, Tab2, Tab3) ->
 2060:     %% The basics 
 2061:     Rec1 = {Tab1, 1, 0, 0},
 2062:     Rec2 = {Tab1, 1, 1, 0},
 2063:     Rec3 = {Tab1, 2, 1, 0},
 2064:     Rec4 = {Tab1, 2, 2, 0},
 2065: 
 2066:     Write  = fun(Tab, Rec) -> 
 2067: 		     mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write(Tab, Rec, write) 
 2068: 					end) 
 2069: 	     end,
 2070:     Delete = fun(Tab, Rec) -> 
 2071: 		     mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:delete(Tab, Rec, write) 
 2072: 					end) 
 2073: 	     end,
 2074:     DelObj = fun(Tab, Rec) -> 
 2075: 		     mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:delete_object(Tab, Rec, write) 
 2076: 					end) 
 2077: 	     end,
 2078: 
 2079:     S = self(),
 2080:     D = {dirty, self()},
 2081:     %% SET 
 2082:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write(Rec1)),
 2083:     ?match({mnesia_table_event, {write, Tab1, Rec1, [], D}}, recv_event()), 
 2084:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write(Rec3)),
 2085:     ?match({mnesia_table_event, {write, Tab1, Rec3, [], D}}, recv_event()),    
 2086:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write(Rec1)),
 2087:     ?match({mnesia_table_event, {write, Tab1, Rec1, [Rec1], D}}, recv_event()),
 2088:     ?match({atomic, ok}, Write(Tab1, Rec2)),
 2089:     ?match({mnesia_table_event, {write, Tab1, Rec2, [Rec1], {tid,_,S}}}, recv_event()),    
 2090:     ?match({mnesia_activity_event, {complete, {tid,_,S}}}, recv_event()),
 2091:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_delete({Tab1, 2})),
 2092:     ?match({mnesia_table_event, {delete, Tab1, {Tab1, 2}, [Rec3], D}}, recv_event()),
 2093:     ?match({atomic, ok}, DelObj(Tab1, Rec2)),
 2094:     ?match({mnesia_table_event, {delete, Tab1, Rec2, [Rec2], {tid,_,S}}}, recv_event()),
 2095:     ?match({mnesia_activity_event, {complete, {tid,_,S}}}, recv_event()),
 2096: 
 2097:     ?match({atomic, ok}, Delete(Tab1, 1)),
 2098:     ?match({mnesia_table_event, {delete, Tab1, {Tab1, 1}, [], {tid,_,S}}}, recv_event()),
 2099:     ?match({mnesia_activity_event, {complete, {tid,_,S}}}, recv_event()),
 2100:     ?match({ok, _N1}, mnesia:unsubscribe({table, Tab1, detailed})),
 2101: 
 2102:     %% BAG 
 2103: 
 2104:     ?match({atomic, ok}, Write(Tab2, Rec1)),
 2105:     ?match({mnesia_table_event, {write, Tab2, Rec1, [], {tid,_,S}}}, recv_event()),
 2106:     ?match({mnesia_activity_event, {complete, {tid,_,S}}}, recv_event()),
 2107:     ?match({atomic, ok}, Write(Tab2, Rec4)),
 2108:     ?match({mnesia_table_event, {write, Tab2, Rec4, [], {tid,_,S}}}, recv_event()),    
 2109:     ?match({mnesia_activity_event, {complete, {tid,_,S}}}, recv_event()),
 2110:     ?match({atomic, ok}, Write(Tab2, Rec3)),
 2111:     ?match({mnesia_table_event, {write, Tab2, Rec3, [Rec4], {tid,_,S}}}, recv_event()),    
 2112:     ?match({mnesia_activity_event, {complete, {tid,_,S}}}, recv_event()),
 2113:     ?match({atomic, ok}, Write(Tab2, Rec2)),
 2114:     ?match({mnesia_table_event, {write, Tab2, Rec2, [Rec1], {tid,_,S}}}, recv_event()),    
 2115:     ?match({mnesia_activity_event, {complete, {tid,_,S}}}, recv_event()),
 2116:     ?match({atomic, ok}, Write(Tab2, Rec1)),
 2117:     ?match({mnesia_table_event, {write, Tab2, Rec1, [Rec1, Rec2], {tid,_,S}}}, recv_event()),
 2118:     ?match({mnesia_activity_event, {complete, {tid,_,S}}}, recv_event()),
 2119:     ?match({atomic, ok}, DelObj(Tab2, Rec2)),
 2120:     ?match({mnesia_table_event, {delete, Tab2, Rec2, [Rec2], {tid,_,S}}}, recv_event()),
 2121:     ?match({mnesia_activity_event, {complete, {tid,_,S}}}, recv_event()),
 2122:     ?match({atomic, ok}, Delete(Tab2, 1)),
 2123:     ?match({mnesia_table_event, {delete, Tab2, {Tab2, 1}, [Rec1], {tid,_,S}}}, recv_event()),
 2124:     ?match({mnesia_activity_event, {complete, {tid,_,S}}}, recv_event()),
 2125:     ?match({atomic, ok}, Delete(Tab2, 2)),
 2126:     ?match({mnesia_table_event, {delete, Tab2, {Tab2, 2}, [Rec4, Rec3], {tid,_,S}}}, recv_event()),
 2127:     ?match({mnesia_activity_event, {complete, {tid,_,S}}}, recv_event()),
 2128: 
 2129:     %% COUNTERS
 2130: 
 2131:     Rec5 = {Tab3, counter, 0},
 2132:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write(Rec5)),
 2133:     ?match({mnesia_table_event, {write, Tab3, Rec5, [], D}}, recv_event()),
 2134:     ?match(1, mnesia:dirty_update_counter({Tab3, counter}, 1)),
 2135:     ?match({mnesia_table_event, {write, Tab3, {Tab3,counter,1}, [Rec5], D}}, recv_event()),
 2136:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_delete({Tab3, counter})),
 2137:     ?match({mnesia_table_event, {delete, Tab3, {Tab3,counter},
 2138: 				 [{Tab3,counter,1}], D}}, recv_event()),
 2139:     ok.
 2140:

 2142: subscribe_standard(doc) ->
 2143:     ["Tests system events and the original table events"];
 2144: subscribe_standard(suite) -> [];
 2145: subscribe_standard(Config) when is_list(Config)-> 
 2146:     [N1, N2]=?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
 2147:     Tab = tab,
 2148: 
 2149:     Storage = mnesia_test_lib:storage_type(disc_copies, Config),
 2150:     Def = [{Storage, [N1, N2]}, {attributes, record_info(fields, tab)}],
 2151: 
 2152:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab, Def)),
 2153: 
 2154:     %% Check system events
 2155:     ?match({error, {badarg, foo}}, mnesia:unsubscribe(foo)),
 2156:     ?match({error, badarg}, mnesia:unsubscribe({table, foo})),
 2157:     mnesia:unsubscribe(activity),
 2158: 
 2159:     ?match({ok, N1}, mnesia:subscribe(system)),
 2160:     ?match({ok, N1}, mnesia:subscribe(activity)),
 2161: 
 2162:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([N2])),
 2163:     ?match({mnesia_system_event, {mnesia_down, N2}}, recv_event()),
 2164:     ?match(timeout, recv_event()),
 2165: 
 2166:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia([N2], [Tab])),
 2167:     ?match({mnesia_activity_event, _}, recv_event()),
 2168:     ?match({mnesia_system_event,{mnesia_up, N2}}, recv_event()),
 2169: 
 2170:     ?match(true, lists:member(self(), mnesia:system_info(subscribers))),
 2171:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([N1])),
 2172:     timer:sleep(500),
 2173:     mnesia_test_lib:flush(),
 2174:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia([N1], [Tab])),
 2175:     ?match(timeout, recv_event()),
 2176: 
 2177:     ?match({ok, N1}, mnesia:subscribe(system)),
 2178:     ?match({error, {already_exists, system}}, mnesia:subscribe(system)),
 2179:     ?match(stopped, mnesia:stop()),
 2180:     ?match({mnesia_system_event, {mnesia_down, N1}}, recv_event()),
 2181:     ?match({error, {node_not_running, N1}}, mnesia:subscribe(system)),
 2182:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia([N1, N2], [Tab])),
 2183: 
 2184:     %% Check table events
 2185:     ?match({ok, N1}, mnesia:subscribe(activity)),
 2186:     Old_Level = mnesia:set_debug_level(trace),
 2187:     ?match({ok, N1}, mnesia:subscribe({table,Tab})),
 2188: 
 2189:     ?match({atomic, ok},
 2190: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write(#tab{i=155}) end)),
 2191:     Self = self(),
 2192:     ?match({mnesia_table_event, {write, _, _}}, recv_event()),
 2193:     ?match({mnesia_activity_event, {complete, {tid, _, Self}}}, recv_event()),
 2194: 
 2195:     ?match({ok, N1}, mnesia:unsubscribe({table,Tab})),
 2196:     ?match({ok, N1}, mnesia:unsubscribe(activity)),
 2197: 
 2198:     ?match({atomic, ok},
 2199: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write(#tab{i=255}) end)),
 2200:     
 2201:     ?match(timeout, recv_event()),
 2202:     mnesia:set_debug_level(Old_Level),
 2203: 
 2204:     %% Check deletion of replica
 2205: 
 2206:     ?match({ok, N1}, mnesia:subscribe({table,Tab})),
 2207:     ?match({ok, N1}, mnesia:subscribe(activity)),
 2208:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write(#tab{i=355})),
 2209:     ?match({mnesia_table_event, {write, _, _}}, recv_event()),
 2210:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:del_table_copy(Tab, N1)),
 2211:     ?match({mnesia_activity_event, _}, recv_event()),
 2212:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write(#tab{i=455})),
 2213:     ?match(timeout, recv_event()),
 2214: 
 2215:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:move_table_copy(Tab, N2, N1)),
 2216:     ?match({mnesia_activity_event, _}, recv_event()),
 2217:     ?match({ok, N1}, mnesia:subscribe({table,Tab})),
 2218:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write(#tab{i=555})),
 2219:     ?match({mnesia_table_event, {write, _, _}}, recv_event()),
 2220:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:move_table_copy(Tab, N1, N2)),
 2221:     ?match({mnesia_activity_event, _}, recv_event()),
 2222:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write(#tab{i=655})),
 2223:     ?match(timeout, recv_event()),
 2224: 
 2225:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:add_table_copy(Tab, N1, ram_copies)),
 2226:     ?match({mnesia_activity_event, _}, recv_event()),
 2227:     ?match({ok, N1}, mnesia:subscribe({table,Tab})),
 2228:     ?match({error, {already_exists, {table,Tab, simple}}}, 
 2229: 	   mnesia:subscribe({table,Tab})),
 2230:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write(#tab{i=755})),
 2231:     ?match({mnesia_table_event, {write, _, _}}, recv_event()),
 2232: 
 2233:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:delete_table(Tab)),
 2234:     ?match({mnesia_activity_event, _}, recv_event()),
 2235:     ?match(timeout, recv_event()),
 2236: 
 2237:     mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([N1]),
 2238: 
 2239:     ?verify_mnesia([N2], [N1]).
 2240: 
 2241: recv_event() ->
 2242:     receive
 2243: 	Event -> Event
 2244:     after 1000 -> 
 2245: 	    timeout
 2246:     end.
 2247:

 2250: 
 2251: foldl(suite) ->
 2252:     [];
 2253: foldl(doc) ->
 2254:     [""];
 2255: foldl(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2256:     Nodes = [_N1, N2] = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
 2257:     Tab1 = fold_local,
 2258:     Tab2 = fold_remote,
 2259:     Tab3 = fold_ordered, 
 2260:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab1, [{ram_copies, Nodes}])),
 2261:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab2, [{ram_copies, [N2]}, {type, bag}])),
 2262:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab3, [{ram_copies, Nodes}, 
 2263: 						    {type, ordered_set}])),    
 2264: 
 2265:     Tab1Els = [{Tab1, N, N} || N <- lists:seq(1, 10)],
 2266:     Tab2Els = ?sort([{Tab2, 1, 2} | [{Tab2, N, N} || N <- lists:seq(1, 10)]]),
 2267:     Tab3Els = [{Tab3, N, N} || N <- lists:seq(1, 10)],
 2268: 
 2269:     [mnesia:sync_transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write(E) end) || E <- Tab1Els],
 2270:     [mnesia:sync_transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write(E) end) || E <- Tab2Els],
 2271:     [mnesia:sync_transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write(E) end) || E <- Tab3Els],
 2272: 
 2273:     Fold = fun(Tab) ->
 2274: 		   lists:reverse(mnesia:foldl(fun(E, A) -> [E | A] end, [], Tab))
 2275: 	   end,
 2276:     Fold2 = fun(Tab, Lock) ->
 2277: 		    lists:reverse(mnesia:foldl(fun(E, A) -> [E | A] end, [], Tab, Lock))
 2278: 	    end,    
 2279:     Exit = fun(Tab) ->
 2280: 		   lists:reverse(mnesia:foldl(fun(_E, _A) -> exit(testing) end, [], Tab))
 2281: 	   end,
 2282:     %% Errors 
 2283:     ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:transaction(Fold, [error])),
 2284:     ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:transaction(fun(Tab) -> mnesia:foldl(badfun,[],Tab) end,
 2285: 					    [Tab1])),    
 2286:     ?match({aborted, testing}, mnesia:transaction(Exit, [Tab1])), 
 2287:     ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:transaction(Fold2, [Tab1, read_lock])),
 2288: 
 2289:     %% Success
 2290:     ?match({atomic, Tab1Els}, sort_res(mnesia:transaction(Fold, [Tab1]))),
 2291:     ?match({atomic, Tab2Els}, sort_res(mnesia:transaction(Fold, [Tab2]))),
 2292:     ?match({atomic, Tab3Els}, mnesia:transaction(Fold, [Tab3])),        
 2293: 
 2294:     ?match({atomic, Tab1Els}, sort_res(mnesia:transaction(Fold2, [Tab1, read]))),
 2295:     ?match({atomic, Tab1Els}, sort_res(mnesia:transaction(Fold2, [Tab1, write]))),
 2296: 
 2297:     ?match(Tab1Els, sort_res(mnesia:sync_dirty(Fold, [Tab1]))),
 2298:     ?match(Tab2Els, sort_res(mnesia:async_dirty(Fold, [Tab2]))),
 2299: 
 2300:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).	   
 2301: 
 2302: sort_res({atomic, List}) ->
 2303:     {atomic, ?sort(List)};
 2304: sort_res(Else) when is_list(Else) ->
 2305:     ?sort(Else);
 2306: sort_res(Else) ->
 2307:     Else.
 2308: 
 2309: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2310: 
 2311: info(suite) -> [];

 2313:     Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(1, Config),
 2314:     ?match(ok, mnesia:info()),
 2315:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 2316:

 2321:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).

 2331: view_0(suite) -> [];

 2336: 
 2337: view_1(suite) -> [];
 2338: view_1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2339:     Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(1, Config),
 2340:     BinCore = mnesia_lib:mkcore({crashinfo, "Just testing..."}),
 2341:     CoreFile = lists:concat(["MnesiaCore.", node(), ".view_1.", ?MODULE]),
 2342:     ?match(ok, file:write_file(CoreFile, BinCore)),
 2343:     ?match(ok, mnesia_lib:view(CoreFile)),
 2344:     ?match(ok, file:delete(CoreFile)),
 2345: 
 2346:     ?match(stopped, mnesia:stop()),
 2347:     Dir = mnesia:system_info(directory),
 2348:     ?match(eof, mnesia_lib:view(filename:join(Dir, "LATEST.LOG"))),
 2349:     ?match(ok, mnesia_lib:view(filename:join(Dir, "schema.DAT"))),
 2350:     ?verify_mnesia([], Nodes).
 2351: 
 2352: view_2(suite) -> [];
 2353: view_2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2354:     Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(1, Config),
 2355:     BinCore = mnesia_lib:mkcore({crashinfo, "More testing..."}),
 2356:     File = lists:concat([?MODULE, "view_2.", node()]),
 2357:     ?match(ok, file:write_file(File, BinCore)),
 2358:     ?match(ok, mnesia_lib:view(File, core)),
 2359:     ?match(ok, file:delete(File)),
 2360: 
 2361:     ?match(stopped, mnesia:stop()),
 2362:     Dir = mnesia:system_info(directory),
 2363:     ?match(ok, file:rename(filename:join(Dir, "LATEST.LOG"), File)),
 2364:     ?match(eof, mnesia_lib:view(File, log)),
 2365:     ?match(ok, file:delete(File)),
 2366: 
 2367:     ?match(ok, file:rename(filename:join(Dir, "schema.DAT"), File)),
 2368:     ?match(ok, mnesia_lib:view(File, dat)),
 2369:     ?match(ok, file:delete(File)),
 2370:     ?verify_mnesia([], Nodes).
 2371: 
 2372: lkill(suite) -> [];
 2373: lkill(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2374:     [Node1, Node2] = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
 2375: 
 2376:     ?match(yes, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, system_info, [is_running])),
 2377:     ?match(yes, rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, system_info, [is_running])),
 2378:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, lkill, [])),
 2379:     ?match(yes, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, system_info, [is_running])),
 2380:     ?match(no, rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, system_info, [is_running])),
 2381:     ?verify_mnesia([Node1], [Node2]).
 2382: 
 2383: kill(suite) -> [];
 2384: kill(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2385:     [Node1, Node2] = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
 2386: 
 2387:     ?match(yes, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, system_info, [is_running])),
 2388:     ?match(yes, rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, system_info, [is_running])),
 2389:     ?match({_, []}, rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, kill, [])),
 2390:     ?match(no, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, system_info, [is_running])),
 2391:     ?match(no, rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, system_info, [is_running])),
 2392:     ?verify_mnesia([], [Node1, Node2]).
 2393:

 2417: record_name_dirty_access(Storage, Config) ->
 2418:     [Node1, _Node2] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
 2419: 
 2420:     List = lists:concat([record_name_dirty_access_, Storage]),
 2421:     Tab = list_to_atom(List),
 2422:     RecName = some_record,
 2423:     Attr = val,
 2424:     TabDef = [{type, bag},
 2425: 	      {record_name, RecName},
 2426: 	      {index, [Attr]},
 2427: 	      {Storage, Nodes}],
 2428:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab, TabDef)),
 2429: 
 2430:     ?match(RecName, mnesia:table_info(Tab, record_name)),
 2431: 
 2432:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write(Tab, {RecName, 2, 20})),
 2433:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write(Tab, {RecName, 2, 21})),
 2434:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write(Tab, {RecName, 2, 22})),
 2435: 
 2436:     %% Backup test
 2437:     BupFile = List ++ ".BUP",
 2438:     CpName = cpname,
 2439:     CpArgs = [{name, CpName}, {min, [Tab]}, {ram_overrides_dump, true}],
 2440:     ?match({ok, CpName, _}, mnesia:activate_checkpoint(CpArgs)),
 2441:     ?match(ok, mnesia:backup_checkpoint(CpName, BupFile)),
 2442:     ?match(ok, mnesia:deactivate_checkpoint(CpName)),
 2443: 
 2444:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write(Tab, {RecName, 1, 10})),
 2445:     ?match({ok, Node1}, mnesia:subscribe({table, Tab})),
 2446:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write(Tab, {RecName, 3, 10})),
 2447: 
 2448:     Twos =?sort( [{RecName, 2, 20}, {RecName, 2, 21}, {RecName, 2, 22}]),
 2449:     ?match(Twos, ?sort(mnesia:dirty_read(Tab, 2))),
 2450: 
 2451:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_delete_object(Tab, {RecName, 2, 21})),
 2452: 
 2453:     Tens = ?sort([{RecName, 1, 10}, {RecName, 3, 10}]),
 2454:     TenPat = {RecName, '_', 10},
 2455:     ?match(Tens, ?sort(mnesia:dirty_match_object(Tab, TenPat))),
 2456:     ?match(Tens, ?sort(mnesia:dirty_select(Tab, [{TenPat, [], ['$_']}]))),
 2457: 
 2458:     %% Subscription test
 2459:     E = mnesia_table_event,
 2460:     ?match_receive({E, {write, {Tab, 3, 10}, _}}),
 2461:     ?match_receive({E, {delete_object, {Tab, 2, 21}, _}}),
 2462:     ?match({ok, Node1}, mnesia:unsubscribe({table, Tab})),
 2463: 
 2464:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:stop_mnesia([Node1])),
 2465:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia(Nodes, [Tab])),
 2466: 
 2467:     ?match(Tens, ?sort(mnesia:dirty_index_match_object(Tab, TenPat, Attr) )),
 2468:     ?match(Tens, ?sort(mnesia:dirty_index_read(Tab, 10, Attr))),
 2469: 
 2470:     ?match([1, 2, 3], ?sort(mnesia:dirty_all_keys(Tab))),
 2471: 
 2472:     ?match({ok, Node1}, mnesia:subscribe({table, Tab})),
 2473:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_delete(Tab, 2)),
 2474:     ?match([], mnesia:dirty_read(Tab, 2)),
 2475: 
 2476:     ?match_receive({E, {delete, {Tab, 2}, _}}),
 2477:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:flush()),
 2478:     ?match({ok, Node1}, mnesia:unsubscribe({table, Tab})),
 2479: 
 2480:     %% Restore test
 2481:     ?match({atomic, [Tab]}, mnesia:restore(BupFile, [{recreate_tables, [Tab]}])),
 2482:     ?match(RecName, mnesia:table_info(Tab, record_name)),
 2483: 
 2484:     ?match(Twos, ?sort(mnesia:dirty_match_object(Tab, mnesia:table_info(Tab, wild_pattern)))),
 2485:     ?match(Twos, ?sort(mnesia:dirty_select(Tab, 
 2486: 					   [{mnesia:table_info(Tab, wild_pattern),
 2487: 					     [],['$_']}]))),
 2488: 
 2489:     %% Traverse backup test
 2490: 
 2491:     Fun = fun(Rec, {Good, Bad}) ->
 2492: 		  ?verbose("BUP: ~p~n", [Rec]),
 2493: 		  case Rec of
 2494: 		      {T, K, V} when T == Tab ->
 2495: 			  Good2 = Good ++ [{RecName, K, V}],
 2496: 			  {[Rec], {?sort(Good2), Bad}};
 2497: 		      {T, K} when T == Tab ->
 2498: 			  Good2 = [G || G <- Good, element(2, G) /= K],
 2499: 			  {[Rec], {?sort(Good2), Bad}};
 2500: 		      _ when element(1, Rec) == schema ->
 2501: 			  {[Rec], {Good, Bad}};
 2502: 		      _ ->
 2503: 			  Bad2 = Bad ++ [Rec],
 2504: 			  {[Rec], {Good, ?sort(Bad2)}}
 2505: 		  end
 2506:           end,
 2507: 
 2508:     ?match({ok, {Twos, []}}, mnesia:traverse_backup(BupFile, mnesia_backup, 
 2509: 						    dummy, read_only, 
 2510: 						    Fun, {[], []})),
 2511:     ?match(ok, file:delete(BupFile)),
 2512: 
 2513:     %% Update counter test
 2514: 
 2515:     CounterTab = list_to_atom(lists:concat([Tab, "_counter"])),
 2516:     CounterTabDef = [{record_name, some_counter}],
 2517:     C = my_counter,
 2518:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(CounterTab, CounterTabDef)),
 2519:     ?match(some_counter, mnesia:table_info(CounterTab, record_name)),
 2520:     ?match(0, mnesia:dirty_update_counter(CounterTab, gurka, -10)),
 2521:     ?match(10, mnesia:dirty_update_counter(CounterTab, C, 10)),
 2522:     ?match(11, mnesia:dirty_update_counter(CounterTab, C, 1)),
 2523:     ?match(4711, mnesia:dirty_update_counter(CounterTab, C, 4700)),
 2524:     ?match([{some_counter, C, 4711}], mnesia:dirty_read(CounterTab, C)),
 2525:     ?match(0, mnesia:dirty_update_counter(CounterTab, C, -4747)),
 2526: 
 2527:     %% Registry tests
 2528: 
 2529:     RegTab = list_to_atom(lists:concat([Tab, "_registry"])),
 2530:     RegTabDef = [{record_name, some_reg}],
 2531:     ?match(ok, mnesia_registry:create_table(RegTab, RegTabDef)),
 2532:     ?match(some_reg, mnesia:table_info(RegTab, record_name)),
 2533:     {success, RegRecs} =
 2534: 	?match([_ | _], mnesia_registry_test:dump_registry(node(), RegTab)),
 2535: 
 2536:     R = ?sort(RegRecs),
 2537:     ?match(R, ?sort(mnesia_registry_test:restore_registry(node(), RegTab))),
 2538: 
 2539:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 2540: 
 2541: sorted_ets(suite) ->
 2542:     [];
 2543: sorted_ets(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2544:     [N1, N2, N3] = All = ?acquire_nodes(3, Config),
 2545: 
 2546:     Tab = sorted_tab,    
 2547:     Def = case  mnesia_test_lib:diskless(Config) of
 2548: 	      true ->  [{name, Tab}, {type, ordered_set}, {ram_copies, All}];
 2549: 	      false -> [{name, Tab}, {type, ordered_set},
 2550: 			{ram_copies, [N1]}, 
 2551: 			{disc_copies,[N2, N3]}]
 2552: 	  end,
 2553: 
 2554:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Def)),
 2555:     ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:create_table(fel, [{disc_only_copies, N1}])),
 2556: 
 2557:     ?match([ok | _], 
 2558: 	   [mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, {dirty, N}, N}) || N <- lists:seq(1, 10)]),    
 2559:     ?match({atomic, _}, 
 2560: 	   mnesia:sync_transaction(fun() ->
 2561: 					   [mnesia:write({Tab, {trans, N}, N}) || 
 2562: 					       N <- lists:seq(1, 10)]
 2563: 				   end)),
 2564: 
 2565:     List = mnesia:dirty_match_object({Tab, '_', '_'}),
 2566:     ?match(List, ?sort(List)),
 2567:     ?match(List, rpc:call(N2, mnesia, dirty_match_object, [{Tab, '_', '_'}])),
 2568:     ?match(List, rpc:call(N3, mnesia, dirty_match_object, [{Tab, '_', '_'}])),
 2569: 
 2570:     mnesia_test_lib:stop_mnesia(All),
 2571:     mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia(All, [sorted_tab]),
 2572: 
 2573:     List = mnesia:dirty_match_object({Tab, '_', '_'}),
 2574:     ?match(List, ?sort(List)),
 2575:     ?match(List, rpc:call(N2, mnesia, dirty_match_object, [{Tab, '_', '_'}])),
 2576:     ?match(List, rpc:call(N3, mnesia, dirty_match_object, [{Tab, '_', '_'}])),
 2577: 
 2578:     ?match(List, rpc:call(N3, mnesia, dirty_select, [Tab, [{{Tab, '_', '_'},[],['$_']}]])),
 2579: 
 2580:     TransMatch = fun() ->
 2581: 			 mnesia:write({Tab, {trans, 0}, 0}),
 2582: 			 mnesia:write({Tab, {trans, 11}, 11}),
 2583: 			 mnesia:match_object({Tab, '_', '_'})
 2584: 		 end,
 2585:     TransSelect = fun() ->
 2586: 			  mnesia:write({Tab, {trans, 0}, 0}),
 2587: 			  mnesia:write({Tab, {trans, 11}, 11}),
 2588: 			  mnesia:select(Tab, [{{Tab, '_', '_'},[],['$_']}])
 2589: 		  end,
 2590: 
 2591:     TList = mnesia:transaction(TransMatch),
 2592:     STList = ?sort(TList),
 2593:     ?match(STList, TList),
 2594:     ?match(STList, rpc:call(N2, mnesia, transaction, [TransMatch])),
 2595:     ?match(STList, rpc:call(N3, mnesia, transaction, [TransMatch])),
 2596: 
 2597:     TSel = mnesia:transaction(TransSelect),
 2598:     ?match(STList, TSel),
 2599:     ?match(STList, rpc:call(N2, mnesia, transaction, [TransSelect])),
 2600:     ?match(STList, rpc:call(N3, mnesia, transaction, [TransSelect])),
 2601: 
 2602:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(rec, [{type, ordered_set}])),
 2603:     [ok = mnesia:dirty_write(R) || R <- [{rec,1,1}, {rec,2,1}]],
 2604:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:add_table_index(rec, 3)),    
 2605:     TestIt = fun() ->
 2606: 		     ok = mnesia:write({rec,1,1}),
 2607: 		     mnesia:index_read(rec, 1, 3)
 2608: 	     end,
 2609:     ?match({atomic, [{rec,1,1}, {rec,2,1}]}, mnesia:transaction(TestIt)).
 2610: 
 2611: 
 2612: index_cleanup(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2613:     [N1, N2] = All = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
 2614:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(i_set, [{type, set}, {ram_copies, [N1]}, {index, [val]},
 2615:                                                      {disc_only_copies, [N2]}])),
 2616:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(i_bag, [{type, bag}, {ram_copies, [N1]}, {index, [val]},
 2617:                                                      {disc_only_copies, [N2]}])),
 2618:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(i_oset, [{type, ordered_set}, {ram_copies, [N1, N2]},
 2619:                                                       {index, [val]}])),
 2620: 
 2621:     Tabs = [i_set, i_bag, i_oset],
 2622: 
 2623:     Add = fun(Tab) ->
 2624:                   Write = fun(Table) ->
 2625:                                   Recs = [{Table, N, N rem 5} || N <- lists:seq(1,10)],
 2626:                                   [ok = mnesia:write(Rec) || Rec <- Recs],
 2627:                                   Recs
 2628:                           end,
 2629:                   {atomic, Recs} = mnesia:sync_transaction(Write, [Tab]),
 2630:                   lists:sort(Recs)
 2631:           end,
 2632: 
 2633:     IRead = fun(Tab) ->
 2634:                     Read = fun(Table) ->
 2635:                                    [mnesia:index_read(Table, N, val) || N <- lists:seq(0,4)]
 2636:                            end,
 2637:                     {atomic, Recs} = mnesia:transaction(Read, [Tab]),
 2638:                     lists:sort(lists:flatten(Recs))
 2639:            end,
 2640: 
 2641:     Delete = fun(Rec) ->
 2642:                      Del = fun() -> mnesia:delete_object(Rec) end,
 2643:                      {atomic, ok} = mnesia:sync_transaction(Del),
 2644:                      ok
 2645:              end,
 2646: 
 2647: 
 2648:     Recs = [Add(Tab) || Tab <- Tabs],
 2649:     ?match(Recs, [IRead(Tab) || Tab <- Tabs]),
 2650:     [Delete(Rec) || Rec <- lists:flatten(Recs)],
 2651: 
 2652:     [?match({Tab,0}, {Tab,mnesia:table_info(Tab, size)}) || Tab <- Tabs],
 2653: 
 2654:     [?match({Tab,Node,0, _}, rpc:call(Node, ?MODULE, index_size, [Tab]))
 2655:      || Node <- All, Tab <- Tabs],
 2656:     ?verify_mnesia(All, []).
 2657: 
 2658: index_size(Tab) ->
 2659:     %% White box testing
 2660:     case mnesia:table_info(Tab, index_info) of
 2661:         {index, _, [{_, {ram, Ref}}=Dbg]} -> {Tab, node(), ets:info(Ref, size), Dbg};
 2662:         {index, _, [{_, {dets, Ref}}=Dbg]} -> {Tab, node(), dets:info(Ref, size), Dbg}
 2663:     end.
